———
Chapter 40: Flyin Undetected - Aimi’s Tale




"You could've been killed!"


“Well, neither of us got killed.
That's what counts."
Aimi struggled to pull her hand free from
under his arm, then stopped, leaned
forward and kissed his cheek.



“Thank you for rescuing me, even though
I didn’t ask you to you big idiot”
she said softly. He rubbed her trapped
hand with his own.


"You didn’t have to and You're welcome."


“Excuse me," Douglas said.
“Can somebody please tell me
what's going on here?"



Douglas watched as Michael and the giant
girl exchanged glances. Steve shrugged!



“Well that’s a rather lengthy story” he said flatly.


“Captain--what's your name anyway?"
Asked Aimi.



"Douglas. Meredith Douglas."



"Okay. Well, Meredith Douglas, you might find it
difficult to believe."




“Right now, if you told me the moon
was made of green cheese I'd believe you,"
Douglas replied. She looked at Aimi.


“Whatever happened to you?"



“Well you see around a week and a half or so
ago I was 4 feet tall and 80 some pounds”


Douglas looked incredulous but
continued to listen.



“You see I’m not exactly popular, and I was always
short and scrawny for my age. I’m 14 by the way
gonna be 15 later this year whereas apparently
Michael had just turned 17 not long ago”


Again Douglas looked shocked.


“Anyway also without getting too into
It my parents died in an accident and
my family life and rest of my life got
more complicated.”


“I’ll bet” said Douglas


“Anyway I kinda had amnesia but my
memories have been returning!
You see I kinda got taken in by this
famous lady detective slash crime fighter”


“Wait do you mean that
Sasha Marie Looker gal”
Asked Douglas.

“Wait you know her” asked Michael.


“Know her? Heck she’s both helped the
military and created headaches for us”


“Anyway she took me in and unwittingly turned
me into her apprentice.
My dreams had been to be a singer, actress
and model but that takes money and
time and connections so the trade off was I
Had to help Sasha!


Anyway this case came up where this
crime syndicate had connections to an
upcoming audition contest and meet n greet
so Sasha had me go undercover as a contestant.”


Douglas, and the others on their plane
were now on the edge of their seats.
Michael having heard some of this or
even lived it was still on the edge of his seat too.


“Anyway things went south and they
found out I was a fake thanks to a classmate!
They kidnapped me to use as leverage
After we had chased them to a
K-Mart super store.


I can’t remember everything but they
did something to me.
I musta passed out then Michael
Apparently found me outside of a burning
exploded semi truck.



And well pretty much since then I’ve
Apparently and quite obviously been
growing. It’s a bit more than I expected
from puberty but it’s not like we’ve
been able to explain or control it”


There was a pause.



“Anyway shortly thereafter we noticed I was
growing. We went to my family doctor then
he recommended us to a nearby hospital.
There I was poked, prodded and then
Kidnapped by military goons”



“Oh my” said Douglas.


“It get worse” said Michael.



“After I was captured I was drugged with
a supposedly lethal dose of tranquilizers.
After surviving some military jerk groped me.
So I broke his arm but that Lang guy went
postal.”


“Sounds like that military jerk got his just
deserts” said Douglas aloud.


“That wasn’t the half of it though!
Those bastards are lucky I wasn’t there!
I’d have broken the other arm” said Michael.


“Anyway they took me away to some facility
on your base and poked, prodded and tortured
me there” she said gesturing to her arm as
Michael snapped some pictures.


“Also several more people at the facility
groped me and a few creepy guys had the
audacity to watch me take the one shower I
was allowed so far and then get dressed”


“Oh my you poor girl” Douglas despite her
training was sympathetic.


Then Michael spoke again.



“So yea When she went to her family
doctor he had her admitted to a hospital.
While she was at the hospital those goons
grabbed her and transported her to Brooks.
I saw them grab her, but I couldn't do
anything to help her--they were after me,
too. So I hightailed it home and formulated a
plan to get Aimi back, at all costs
and it worked--so far."





"Jesus Christ," Douglas breathed.
“Jesus Christ. This is insane.
I feel--I feel like I'm in some kind of bad
science-fiction movie."



"Well, Captain Douglas, you're not,"
Michael replied as he rubbed
Aimi’s arm.




"What we've told you is the truth
that we've experienced, and, for good or ill,
you've become a part of our story."



Douglas absorbed everything she’d learned.
On one hand she could understand Lisa being
captured on the other hand hand the handling of
her may have gone overboard if not drastically
overboard.


She’d heard less than pleasant things about this
Lang character and thus far several proved true
non the least of which were his strong arm tactics
and a general as well as sexist disrespectful
attitude towards females.



He was old school, didn’t think women belonged
anywhere in the service or armed forces except
for the commissary, the med wards as nurses
and laundry facilities.


She hadn’t met Lang personally yet but she
imagined he wouldn’t respect her rank or feel it
deserved.
1133111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Ch 40

1133111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/12...
——
Chapter 41: Landing

— Airborne somewhere over the
State of Tennessee
Sometime Monday Evening—-




"It really wasn't difficult to find you,"
Michael said to Aimi.
He had twisted in his seat to face her,
leaving the airplane flying on autopilot.


Aimi had folded her legs as neatly as the
space would allow and seated herself on
the deck with her back to the front passenger
door, leaning her head and shoulders into
the cockpit, her hand touching Michael's
right arm. The Air Force captain who had
intruded into Aimi’s escape sat in 1 of
the co-pilots chair, observing the displays
illuminating the cockpit.




“My first advantage was that Lang
used a cellular phone," he continued.
“After I escaped from the hospital I started
calling some of my people to help. I
first contacted someone I'll call Frank,
who's been a computer programmer for
over twenty years. I asked him to hack into
the telephone company's computers.


He found one cellular phone used
Sunday afternoon in Poughkeepsie
that had a non-New York area code
in its security code. He filtered the
telephone numbers that phone had
been used to call.



One of the numbers had area code
404 and a prefix number for
North Druid Hills--Turner's number
at the Centers for Disease Control
in Atlanta.
The others were Government use only,
with area code 801--Utah."



Michael straightened in his seat and
stretched his shoulders. In the dim
light of the touch switches embedded
in the arm of his chair.


Aimi could see his eyes were red
and shadowed and his face was drawn
with fatigue. She smiled and nodded for
him to continue.




“Frank went a little further and found
the numbers Turner called after talking to
Lang. That guy called everywhere from
New Hampshire to Hawaii. Then he
checked the eleven numbers Turner
called belonging to individual names
and found that all of them contacted
the Human Systems Center at Brooks
Air Force Base--the department
responsible for arranging housing on base.




Everyone was congregating there after
talking to Turner, and he was called
in on you. Ergo, you were being
taken to Brooks."



Douglas snorted derisively.
“Some secrecy," she muttered.
Michael gave her his lopsided grin.


“The secrecy thing also worked in
my favor," he said.


“No offense, Captain, but one thing
you people in the military seem to
forget is when you make something
top-top-secret the people who could've
prevented actions like mine are kept
in the dark, too.




In fact I was counting on no increased
security at the only P-5 treatment lab at
Brooks, which was on the main floor of
the Armstrong lab building.


Electronic security and the labs' original
design intention were supposed to keep
Aimi’s presence there secret. If Turner
had increased security--say, by requesting
Air Police to patrol the building twenty
four hours a day--he would have cut off
my rescue attempt at the start,
or at least hindered it a bit and
possibly compromised keeping the
secret because he would need help
from somebody outside the immediate
circle he'd drawn.




Thus, all I needed to do was defeat the
electronics--with a pass card I borrowed
from one of the scientists and a little
recorder to give them an image of Aimi
on their monitors when she really
wasn't there--and get her out the door."



Douglas nodded her understanding.
She snorted again, shook her head,
and gave Michael a smile of grudging
respect.




"The one thing I hadn't counted on
was the size of the hatch they apparently
used to get you in there in the first place,
Aimi," he said, turning and smiling up in
apology at her.


“I had a pretty good idea just how much
you might have grown since I was with
you last and that door wouldn't do the job.
So, I improvised with my planned distractions,
and walked you out the front to some
borrowed transportation."



"You really thought it out," Douglas said.
"You've got guts."



It was Michael's turn to snort.
“Right now, Captain, I could shit through
a screen door without hitting the wire."


Douglas looked at Michael and burst
into a fit of semi-hysterical chortling.
She shook her head again.


This time one of the black suit wearing
masked men finally spoke up.
He had a heavy Russian accent.



“Just veremember Michael you didn’t do
it alone. You had help.”
He paused and noticed the look from
Douglas.


“And before voo ask Miss Douglas no I’m
not some VRussian Spy or enemy.
I owe my allegiance and gratitude to our
friend Michael here and the
United States as does my family. Both have
given me and my family great opportunities”



Douglas looked mildly relieved.
So," she said softly, her humor and the
tensions subsided,
"what happens to me?"





Michael’s expression grew amused.
“What do you think will happen to you?
I'll have you taken back to San Antonio,
of course, or wherever else you wish to go.



I don't intend to have 'kidnapper' stuck
behind my name. I already sent a message
to my airfield to have Special Number Two
warmed up and ready to go when you
get there. What happens to you after that
I can only guess."



"You sent a message? How? I didn't hear
you talk on a radio at all since we took off,"
Douglas asked.



Michael motioned to what Douglas had
first taken to be a handrest near the left
arm of his seat. She noticed the five
buttons arranged across its surface.



"It's a keyboard," Michael said.
"Works on much the same principle as the
keyboards made for people with serious
handicaps. With practice you can type
messages as easily with this as a
full-size keyboard.




I sent an e-mail to my people at the
airport telling them to fly Special Two
in to my private strip to take you back."



“You just going to let me go? Just like that?"
Douglas asked.




"It's just like Michael said, Meredith,"
Aimi said.
"I don't want to hurt you, or anybody.
Neither does Michael."


Douglas looked up sharply at Aimi’s use
of her name.
She could see the giant teen--who actually
looked bigger now than she did an hour
ago--was utterly earnest.
So was this Michael character.


“Actually I wouldn’t mind smacking around
the guys that groped you or whomever it
was that used your arm as a carving board”
Michael joked.


“Not helping Michael” said Aimi flatly.


“Anyway I told you, Captain,
I'm no kidnapper," Michael said.
“Nor a terrorist, a foreign agent
or a little green man from Mars in
disguise. Neither is Aimi."
He rubbed the giant hand on his arm.


Douglas stared into Aimi’s slightly tear
filled green eyes and could tell this was
all very genuine.
1133111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Ch 41 - reserved-

1133111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/12...
——-

Chapter 42: Not The Meaning Of Life



“Unfortunately, somebody thinks we’re
the spearhead of some contagion that
threatens the country. I'm not going to
let some government sphincter-boy lock
Aimi or me away. In fact, I think it would
be to your advantage to get a little concerned
about what they're going to do to you
when you return."



Aimi’s expression became sad.



"I'm sorry," she said to Douglas.



“I'm really sorry. I seem to be screwing
up the lives of everyone I touch."



"No you're not," Michael said firmly,
gripping Aimi’s hand.
Douglas was startled to see tears
forming in Aimi’s eyes.
This girl was so goddamned big
she filled all the available space
in the cockpit yet she seemed to
need more comforting than
Douglas herself.



Douglas saw pain in Michael's eyes, too.




Douglas looked from one to the other,
and inclined her head.



"It seems I've caused some problems, too,"
Douglas said slowly.



"All right. I think I understand, at least a little."
She ran her hand through her hair.
Michael smiled and turned back to the
airplane's controls.



"It's too bad though," she said suddenly.
"This would make one pisser barracks story.
You could sell the rights to the X-Files and
make a fortune."



"X-Files?" Michael asked in a puzzled
tone.


"That's fiction. I'm not,"
Aimi replied. Douglas began
chuckling softly until she felt the
lightest of touches


She turned to see two impossibly
long fingers belonging to a hand the
size of a serving platter on her left shoulder.


"Thank you," Aimi said softly.




"I think it's safe to say that all we want,
Captain Douglas, is to be left alone,"
Michael said after clearing his throat.
Aimi nodded vigorously.


“Good luck getting that if a goon like Lang
or a determined jackal like Turner are involved,
Way I hear it neither gives up so easily even if
their tactics and methods differ greatly”


Michael suddenly straightened in his
seat and rubbed his face.
He pushed forward on the airplane's
control handgrip and the airplane
began to descend from its extraordinary
cruising altitude of
one hundred ten thousand feet--descending
very rapidly, to Douglas' mind.




"We're a few minutes from landing.
Want to see it, Captain?"


"Hell yes," Douglas replied.
The airplane continued to drop.
When Douglas saw the altimeter
readout reach forty thousand feet she
observed Michael thumb two switches
on his seat arms.
New symbols began to parade across
the cockpit images.


"What's that?"


“Other traffic," Michael replied.
"I'm in active stealth mode, remember?
No anticollision lights.
I don't want to bang into something up here
while invisible or otherwise."





He looked all around, smiling brightly at
Aimi sitting behind him, peering
between his legs, looking around Douglas
at the tiny, moving bullseyes decorating the walls.



"One, two, three, four--good," he said.
"Nothing near us. Okay, here's the final."


Douglas looked at the clear real-time
image projected on the blank wall in
front of her and saw only darkness.
She felt the airplane's nose pitch down
even more steeply as Michael
worked the controls, pulling back on
the throttle and working the control
grip on his chair.



"I, ah, don’t see any airfield down there,"
Douglas offered.


"It's there," Michael answered.


"Where are the lights?"


"There." Michael pointed.
Douglas squinted to see one or two
very small lights off to the right.
Utter darkness filled the view in
front of the aircraft.



"Don't tell me," she said, her voice
rising one octave.
She swallowed to ease the constriction
in her throat.



“You don't have landing lights at you
private airstrip."



"Yes we do, but I don't need them for
this airplane. Watch and see."


The symbology running across the
image suddenly changed.
A single elongated box appeared,
surrounded by rapidly scrolling
numerical readouts.


Michael reset the wings to their
normal configuration, causing the
airplane to shudder and roll side to side
for a moment then smooth out once again.



With the increased drag of the now
aft-pointing wings the plane slowed
markedly, but to Douglas it was still
going too damned fast towards the
invisible ground.



"You land by virtual reality, too?"
Douglas asked, her voice cracking.



"Yep. Big advantage if you need to
land someplace where there is no
established airport. Just tell the computer
where to land and it shows you
exactly how to get there.
Guides you to within five feet of your
planned stop point.
You Air Force folks should like it
when you get your own."



Douglas had a death grip on the
arms of her chair as Michael flattened
out and deployed the landing gear.
Two gentle thumps announced that the
wheels had touched down and
the airplane began to roll.


He pressed his feet into both
pedals and the airplane shuddered
as it slowed. In the illumination from the
airplane's landing lights Douglas could
now make out the thin macadam airstrip
they had landed on and the two large
hangars beyond, each with it's own door
light. As if on cue the anticollision lights
of another airplane became visible as
Michael brought the airplane to a
smooth stop and began to power
down the aircraft.



"Thank you for flying Air Michael,"
he said, grinning.


“That sounds like a bad name for some
shoes endorsed by Michael Jordan”
joked Aimi.



Michael reached between his legs
and released his seat, letting it
retract back to its rest position,
Douglas following his example.
He stood and stretched, then turned to
Aimi , still folded into the space aft of the cockpit.


Despite the removal of the seats from
the passenger cabin of the airplane
it was still a tight fit for Aimi’s expanded
body. It took her a minute of struggling
with her torso and legs to wend her
way deeper into the passenger cabin.


She realized her body had grown to
the point where even her small was
pushing the parachute dress to its limits.




The sensation of the carpet rubbing
against her buttocks suddenly called to
Aimi’s attention that she was now so
large that her dress was now a
micro-miniskirt that barely covered her
hips and she wore no panties or
other undergarments.


Blushing hotly, she stuffed the front
of her dress into her crotch to hide
her privates.
Michael noticed her motion, spun on his
heel and interposed himself between
her and Douglas, gently propelling
Douglas with one hand on her back
and working to open the door and
deploy the boarding ladder with the other.




“After you, Captain," he said cheerfully.
Douglas yielded and began to negotiate
the ladder. Michael looked briefly over
his shoulder, smiled at Aimi and winked,
then followed Douglas.
Aimi began to slide her way down the
cabin to the door, twisting to slide her
legs out into the cool night air.
1133111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Ch 42

1133111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/12...
———
Chapter 43 : Parting Ways



“After you, Captain," he said cheerfully.
Douglas yielded and began to negotiate
the ladder. Michael looked briefly over
his shoulder, smiled at Aimi and winked,
then followed Douglas.
Aimi began to slide her way down the
cabin to the door, twisting to slide her
legs out into the cool night air.


In a bid for modesty she tugged at her
dress front and crammed the extra
cloth between her legs, stretching the
nylon irritatingly tight across her breasts.
She started to slide out the hatchway
but became stuck in the hatch frame
just below her hips.



She twisted her body, gripped the hatch
frame with her hands and heaved herself
out of the airplane.



Outside the plane it was nearly pitch dark.
Michael had switched off all the airplane's
lights, leaving the dim lighting from the two
hanger lamps to illuminate the ground.
The other airplane, its engines whining
and its anticollision and landing lights
brilliant in the gloom, stood
two hundred feet away.


The black suit wearing figures exited the
Special number 1 last.


Aimi stood erect carefully, testing her
joints, and looked down.


Michael and Captain Douglas were looking
up at her in the dim, indirect light.
Aimi saw that Michael's head now appeared
level with her mid-thigh.
Even Aimi was shocked by her growth.
It seemed her spurts had become erratic
again.



Douglas's eyes were staring from her
head in shock. Aimi quickly sank to her
knees beside them.
Michael reached up and took Aimi’s large
hand in his own.





"Well, Captain," Michael said,
“Your ride's waiting for you.
Please do me the favor of not trying
to talk to the pilot--the cockpit door'll be
locked when you get in.
Just take a seat and enjoy the ride back."



“Douglas nodded wordlessly.
She looked up at Aimi, who held out
her hand. Douglas began to reach for it,
hesitated, and then timidly grasped her
first two fingers.




"What--what's it like?"
Douglas asked. Aimi soberly accepted
the captain's handshake and sighed.


"It's like nothing you can imagine,"
she replied.
“I can barely describe it”



“Douglas stood there for a moment,
then nodded quietly.
She hesitated in turning towards the l
other airplane.



"Listen, there's something you
should know," she said.




"You need to hide yourself and your
airplanes. The NSA and
the PRO--that's the National Security
Agency, a part of the CIA, and the Photographic Reconnaissance Office--have a domestic
satellite they can use to take very
detailed pictures of anything in the
United States--the KF-11 satellite launched
two years ago."




"I thought that satellite was supposed
to be used to monitor environmental
changes," Michael said.




"That's how it got funding to be built,"
Douglas replied.
"It's also used for domestic surveillance.
I've been told it can look down on any town
or individual location in the United States
from 880 kilometers up and tell what
brand of cigarettes a man is holding in
his hand. It's been used to observe
domestic groups deemed a danger to
the government and it will probably be
used to look for you."




Despite the poor light Aimi with her now
enhanced sight could see Michael frown
as he listened to Douglas.
He closed his eyes for a moment, took a
deep breath, then grinned again.




"Thank you, Captain, and good
luck to you,"
he said, offering his hand.
"I have a feeling you might need it
as much as us."


“Th-thank you. Also 2 more things”
Douglas started and then leaned to
whisper to Michael unaware Aimi’s enhanced
hearing was a thing and Aimi could in fact hear.




“Listen I seldom give relationship advice
but take care of this Aimi girl. I can tell you
both mean a lot to each other”



Michael grinned.
“I will and you’re right she is special”
he whispered back.


“Now if you don’t mind I’d like to
address Aimi alone too”

Michael walked off a bit then they spoke.



“Listen Aimi I know we aren’t like girlfriends
but some advice girl to girl.
Take care of that Michael guy.
Something tells me he’s a good catch.


Also work on your confidence.
It’s ok to be meek and timid but if
the government comes after you then
you also need to be willing to defend him
and yourself. I think there’s more inside you
than you know, more than just an alien orb
or crystal thingy.


Take care, be strong, be brave and
be smart”




“Thanks Captain.
You take care too and please keep our secret
as best as you can”


“I dunno what you’re talking about
but I’ll try.” She said as she boarded the plane.



Michael came back over.


Aimi stood erect, stretching her legs
and arms. It was such a sheer pleasure
just to be able to stand upright and move
without bumping into anything.
She celebrated the freedom.
Beside her Michael watched the other
airplane lift into the sky with a roar.


Nodding in satisfaction he strode
towards one of the two hangars.
Aimi was vaguely startled at seeing him l
move away from her out of the corner
of her eye. She realized that it was his size
relative to hers that was so
unusual--where she saw Michael now was
in the same part of her vision that she
was accustomed to seeing small animals
or pets.


Michael reached the near wall of the
hanger and withdrew a ring of keys
from his pocket. He opened the access
plate to a switchbox on the hangar wall and
pushed a button that clicked loudly.
Two rows of lights came on, illuminating
a narrow road running from the two
hangars up a long incline.



He closed the box, looked up at Aimi
and grinned boyishly.


“You ready?"


"Ready for what?"


"I've some things to show you, and
a surprise for you."




"All right."
Michael began to march up the road.
Aimi followed, stepping small to match Michael's
strides. She looked at her new surroundings.
In the low lighting from the pathway lamps
and saw that dense deciduous woods
surrounded the airfield--she could almost
make out the different colors of
each tree's leaves.




The air was fresh, woodsy-smelling and
cool. Aimi exhaled.


"Where are we?" she asked.
Michael looked up over his shoulder.




“Polk County, North Carolina," he replied.
“The town nearest to us here is Edneyville,
over the hill. Over that way,"
he gestured to his right,



"is the city of Asheville. About 55 miles
behind us is Charlotte.
Right up this road is my home, and if
you follow it down to its end you come
to the little complex we've built to house
some of our...well err some of my
family’s companies in."


Aimi smiled at his enthusiastic response.
She looked up at the sky and saw it was
bisected, with clear starry skies directly
above and behind her and utter darkness
before her to the horizon.



"That's the storm we flew out of up there,"
Michael said as he followed her observation.


"It'll be over us probably by the end of the day
tomorrow or Wednesday."


A chilly breeze sprang up, scattering
leaves across the path. Aimi shivered and
wrapped her arms around herself.
The ground brightened as the
near-full moon suddenly peeked out from
behind the clouds.


She looked down at Michael and found herself
wishing she could hold his hand while they
walked, but she was now so tall it would be
uncomfortable for both of
them to try--Michael would need to hold his
arm straight up and Aimi would have to bend
over nearly double for them to touch each
other's hand.
1133111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Ch 43 - parting

1133111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/12...

——
Chapter 44 : Small Not So Small Confessions


She looked down at Michael and found herself
wishing she could hold his hand while they
walked, but she was now so tall it would be
uncomfortable for both of
them to try--Michael would need to hold his
arm straight up and Aimi would have to bend
over nearly double for them to touch each
other's hand.



An envelope of depression enfolded her
and her face fell into a sad frown,
despite Michael's light-hearted antics.


Michael turned on his heel and began
to walk backwards, looking up at Aimi.


"You look very pretty in the moonlight," he said.
Aimi blushed and smiled slightly.


"I look a mess," she replied.



"Not to me--GAWK!" Michael said.
He tripped on his own feet and fell backwards
onto the path, exclaiming in pain.
He shook his head and began to laugh.


"Geez, you'd think I'd been hitting the bottle.
It's not Friday night yet."



Aimi dropped to her knees on the pathway.
She helped him to his feet and kept hold
of him as he brushed at his backside.





"You're tired, aren't you," Aimi asked.
Michael looked up and gave her his
lopsided grin.


"A little. It's been a long day," he replied.
He made no move to remove himself
from her grasp. Aimi returned his grin and
opened her mouth to speak, but hesitated.



"What?" Michael asked.


"Would you like me to carry you?"
she asked, nerving herself for his rejection.


"You're not too tired yourself, are you?"
Michael inquired with belated concern.



“Aimi, I'm sorry, I should have been thinking.
You've had a very hard time for the
last day or so."


Aimi shook her head, a little embarrassed
by his sudden, overt concern for her.




"I do feel a little worn, I guess," she replied,
“but oddly I've felt no need for sleep
since-since the night we made love."
Aimi blushed.



Michael’s smile broadened until it looked
like it could meet behind his head.


“Besides remember I was short of one
half of a crime fighting duo so helping
people is kinda what I do thanks to
Sasha”


Michael chuckled a bit.



“Aimi, I'd very much like it if you carried me,"
he said. Aimi grinned at the anticipation
in his tone.
She hesitated for a few seconds then
cautiously gathered Michael into her arms,
She carefully slung him over her shoulder.


She was surprised at his light weight in
her arms, and then she realized that
at the time she had no experience
in lifting a full-grown,
six-foot man before at her current size.



Gripping him as lightly as possible she
slowly, carefully rose until she was erect.
Michael snaked his right arm around her neck.





"You look a little cross-eyed, there," he teased.
Aimi snorted and hugged.
He smiled at the success of his taunt and
touched her.




"Didn't those Army assholes even have a
comb for you to use?" he asked.


"No," Aimi replied.


"Well, we'll fix that.
You have nice hair for a tomboy!
Now, on to the rotenburo."



“Row-ten-burro?" Aimi asked.
Out of the corner of her eye she saw
Michael nod.


"It's a surprise for you," he replied.
Aimi felt a real smile form on her face
and began to stride up the pathway.
She felt Michael lean into her chest
and shoulder.


“I can't wait to show you everything tomorrow,"
he said.
“Over that way," he pointed off to Aimi’s right,





“is the one garden I managed to get finished. “
It's done in the Zen style--very peaceful.
My co-workers pretty much decreed one
day that I needed to relax.
Since I refused to take a vacation they
suggested a Zen garden near my house.



I've other gardens I'd like to get to work
on--I hope you'll help me with planning
them. And I can't wait to show you our
house. It's based on an old
post-and-beam barn I saw in
New England when I was 15--"




Michael continued to talk
conversationally as Aimi carried him
up the path. She could feel his warmth
against her chest and shoulder.
He was utterly relaxed, trusting
and unafraid as she held him
20 feet above from the ground.




With every breath she took as she
walked she could feel him rise and
fall slightly on her breast.
She felt the occasional pang of
concern as he motioned a little too
broadly and shifted in her hands-
she was trying to keep her grip on
him as light as conceivably possible to
forestall any potential of hurting him.


Michael seemed to notice her concern
as he stopped gesturing long enough to
tuck her hand firmly onto his chest,
then returned to describing what neither
of them could see.


Aimi began to relax and tightened her grip
on his torso. She felt him wriggle into the
warmth of her hand.
Her affection for Michael multiplied and
she bent her head to kiss him.


"What was that for?" he asked, smiling up at her.




"For being so kind," she said.
“You're very brave, and reckless,
and smart, and when I'm with you I
don’t feel like-like an overgrown monstrosity
or a freak."



"Aimi, you're no monstrosity," he protested.
“Something incredible had happened
to you, yes, and it's still happening, but--"


She shifted how she was holding him
having had another small growth spurt
in just the short time of their walk.


“Michael how many girls do you know can
pick up a six-foot something man in their
hands and carry him around like he was
a small boy, like I'm doing with you?
It's just really starting to hit me, now.
I'm so big I'll never be able to do the things
I could do just days ago.




I'll never drive a car.
I'll never be able to use or wear anything
I own. I'm so big I probably couldn't
even crawl into the house I was born
and raised in.


I'm never going to be able to live out my
my dreams and ambitions!
After all who’s ever heard of a 20 some foot
actress, or a 30 foot singer, or even
a 50 foot model.


God the idea seems silly... and yet a part
of me still wants all of that but a part
of me fears what’s happened and is still
happening to me!
At least when I was still in my old life,
still somewhat normal I had a small chance
but now... now...


The worst part is I can't even be around people.


I may be shy, antisocial, a little introverted
,a tomboy and a little intimidating to some
of my classmates and not
have many friends but the few I do have...
What will they think now? How will I interact
with them?
For that matter what about my family?
Or yours?


Just cause I’m no social butterfly doesn’t
mean I want to have to avoid people for life.


Almost everyone I've met since my
body's begun to grow is either suspicious
or afraid of me. Even you--you've been so
good to me, and you're the most wonderful
guy I could ever have imagined meeting,
let alone Kind of sorta like or make love with,
but I'm becoming so big I'm really
afraid that I'm going to injure you or hurt you
in some way.



I feel my life is over, and it hasn't even
begun, yet. God, I wish I'd never gone on
that damn stupid case! Damn crazy crime
syndicate!”



Aimi had come to a stop in the path.
Tears began to fall from her eyes as
she spoke. Michael reached up and
touched her lips and chin with both
hands, pain etched across his features.

you'll stay with me, a'course,
but…you…are…free…"


Aimi opened her eyes and looked quickly at
Michael. He had fallen asleep and began to slip
from the edge of the pool deeper into the water.
She reached out with both hands to keep his head
from going under, her motion slopping water from
the pool, the washcloth on his head slipping off
and floating away.


Aimi held Michael in her arms and brooded
over him. He was smiling gently in his sleep.
Aimi bent down to deliver the lightest touch of
her lips to his forehead and heard him murmur
in response.


He was just like a child right now!


Aimi cradled Michael in her arms and rose
from the pool amid a cloud of steam.
She moved quickly back into the tent,
sliding around the flaps so as not to disturb
her sleeping companion? Lover?.
What did She consider Michael at this point?
They’d made out a few times now.


The thought of it made her blush!
She had to admit that she was
developing serious real feelings
for the perverted fool 2 1/4 Years her senior.


Aimi made her way back into her tent-bedroom
and retrieved one of the huge towels from its box.
She laid the towel out on her bed and placed
Michael on it, gently patting him in its folds.
He muttered once in his sleep and began to snore
gently.



Aimi folded the towel over Michael’s
body and used another one to dry herself,
drawing closer to her mirror.
The image of her body naked was even more
shocking than clothed.


Her belly was tight and flat.
Her pubic hair was lush and
darker than her head hair was.
Aimi thought she looked like those women
she saw advertising exercise equipment
on television.

She could possibly be a model now
if not for the whole
“Attack of the 50 foot woman“ thing she
had going on, granted she approximated she
was more around 25 ish feet tall



She rubbed her hair until it was approximately
dry and snatched up her comb and brush.
She drew her hair to her front and began to
comb out all the knots.
It took a great deal of pulling and she
winced in pain more than once.

Then she applied the brush with vigor.
The sensation of its hard bristles against her
scalp made her wriggle voluptuously.
Freed of tangles, her hair was a
bushy purple-brown mass on her head
and more reaching behind her past her
shoulders.


It was like her hair couldn’t decide if
she were girly or tomboyish.
She turned sideways to see her profile and was so
shocked at her incredible body that she giggled,
holding her hand over her mouth as to not wake
Michael.



If she keeps growing she could have Michael
climb her hair just like Repunzel.


Thinking of Michael made her turn. She put down
her comb and brush and strode to the futon.
Michael had wrapped the towel closer to himself
and turned over onto his side, still snoring softly.
Aimi took him back in her arms, towel and all, and
cradled him while drawing down the sheet and silk
blanket of her bed with a free hand.


She extricated Michael from the towel and
carefully stretched him out on one corner of her
futon, then slipped beside him, drawing up the
bedclothes. She settled herself and turned on
her side and rested her hand on Michael, feeling
his warmth.


Aimi lay there and watched Michael as he slept,
occasionally closing her eyes yet unable to sleep,
listening to the gentle outside sounds that
permeated the fabric of her new home. She smiled.


— Task Force Seven
Joint Military Headquarters
Johnston Atoll
Overnight ——


Colonel Bartholomew Lang stepped out of
the Air Force transport plane into the sultry
Pacific air of the DART headquarters.
His face, as usual, revealed nothing of his
thoughts as he received the salutes of
subordinate officers during his walk to the
Quonset hut that enclosed DART's home base.




He was still furious. Every possible idiot who
could have interfered with the smooth running
of his operation had done so.
That gasbag General Mackenzie at Brooks
had written a scathing report on his demands
that the airplane the growing woman had escaped
in be shot down, and it took two hours of
phone calls and vapid promises to secure
his release from Brooks.



Turner had pissed his pants when he
found the girl was gone and had now
returned to the CDC, doubtless to write
another monograph on what a wonderful
administrator he was. Lang frowned.
Whoever had taken the girl was canny and
very dangerous, and had taken on Lang and DART.



Whoever it was, they needed to be
eliminated--no one was going to dump on
Lang or DART.
There was also still the matter of that insect who
had been that sluts hanger on companion.
Probably harmless but still a variable that needed
captured and dealt with.


And dealt with he shall be.
None of the folks involved were about
to let this matter rest!
1133111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Ch 49 - cont - reserved

1133111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/12...
——
Chapter 50 : This Isn’t Over Part I

— Task Force Seven
Joint Military Headquarters
Johnston Atoll
Overnight —-

For now he would be content to watch and wait.
He had issued new orders to the IRS,
to Customs, to the Justice department.
The girl was growing at the rate of two and a
half inches an hour. It was only a matter of time
before someone saw her, or someone
custom-made clothing or accommodations
for her.



When he received word he would be free to
move again. Lang looked up at the bucolic
Pacific sky and allowed himself a small grin.
It was going to be a successful operation after all
one way or another.

— Polk County, North Carolina
Tuesday Morning Early AM —-

Aimi opened her eyes.
She was lying on her side,
facing the sleeping figure of Michael.
Michael had been quiet during
the hours after they had made love,
rolling over only once under
her hand. He now lay facing her,
mouth open
and hair wild, his eyes flickering beneath
their lids in a dream.
Aimi kissed him delicately and slipped
from under the sheet and silk blanket
covering her futon,
pausing to tuck Michael under a corner of the covers.


Aimi stretched to her full height--whatever that
now was--and bent each of her limbs to its limit,
reveling in the feeling of warmth and
release as each muscle was pulled and loosened.
She inhaled deeply and looked down at the pole lights surrounding her bed. She must remember to
ask if there was a switch so she could turn the
lights out herself. Her eye then fell on the
large wooden crates surrounding her tent-home
and her curiosity reawakened.


She retrieved some of her new clothes from the
boxes and spent a few moments orienting herself
to their construction. The socks were simple tubes
woven in various sizes, with thick protective
leather-like soles sewn onto their bottoms.
Aimi tried on three pairs until she found one
which fit well. The panties were silk with a
two-part elastic waistband that attached well
above her hips with velcro fasteners.


Each half of the waistband had a large overlap
and all she would need to do is adjust the
fasteners to achieve a comfortable
fit--whoever designed these had tremendous
foresight, Aimi thought, to consider her future
growth in their design.


Likewise, the bras were made of alternating
panels of soft silk and springy nylon with
similar fasteners under each arm and across
the shoulders, save for two which were strapless.


Aimi grinned and slipped on one of the strapless
kind. The cups were soft and a
little loose--something, she thought resignedly,
that would not last in the next day or so.
At least her cup size were now more defined.
The label read “ B Cup -???”


Then she pulled the white silk nightdress she had
examined the night before over her head and
buttoned the sash around her waist. It was crafted
like a long-sleeved firenze gown with a translucent décolletage and a ground-length skirt that called as
much attention to her figure as it hid.
The soft silk against her skin gave her a licentious
pleasure she had never expected to enjoy again
and she wriggled sensually.


Aimi strode to her mirror and looked at her
reflection. Clothed in simple white, she was
astonished to see such a beauty
looking back at her in the polished metal.
She took up her comb and brush and smoothed
her hair. She drew the mass in front of her,
considering, then combed her hair into three
equal tresses and essayed braiding it.


Her fingers were unaccustomed to the
task--she had not had long hair since she was
8 years old--and her first two attempts were
irritating and painful failures, but on the third try she managed to plait one long braid that she flipped
down her back after tying off its end with a small
piece of cord she broke from a tent panel.


Aimi saw a tiny motion in the background
image in her mirror and turned.
Michael had rolled over on his back.
She smiled at his still form. His confidence,
enthusiasm, and unrestrained love for her
were infectious, and for the first time since
she had begun to grow Aimi found herself
sharing his emotions. She remembered the
sexual calisthenics they had engaged in the
previous night and blushed.


He'd been right about that,
too--they could be intimate despite the
disparity in their sizes--and she blew him a
silent kiss. Then a curious sound from outside
caught her attention.


Closing the flap behind her she walked
slowly across a silvered lawn towards the
woods that she could now see surrounded
the property. Aimi looked up the side of the
mountain away from the dawn and saw a
bird soaring against a cloud-covered sky.


It was some kind she’d never seen,
with a brownish body
and brownish-red wings and tail--a red-tailed hawk?
It repeated its thin, raspy cry, circling high up the
mountain. More sounds began to greet the dawn.
A loud, brazen call by a chickadee diverted her
attention downward to see the little bird boldly
circling her. She grinned at its antics.


She wasn't keen on some ways the animal
kingdom worked but it did remind that
given her growing circumstances perhaps
in theory she was now the hawk, or the lion.


She estimated she was nearing 28 feet tall
and had to admit that a few of the bad guys
her and Sasha dealt with probably would
have a harder time with her new self.


Aimi stretched again in the cold morning air,
her heart light. Despite the obvious chill
in the air she felt no sense of cold at all.
It was a wonderful moment to be alive.


Aimi turned and got her first good look at
Michael's home. It was a massive structure,
better than triple maybe even quadruple
her present height.
White clapboards rose up from a rough stone
foundation to a high gable roof punctured by
three dormers on both sides. She noticed a small
railed platform set in the center of the roof, with
tall posts at each corner--a widow's walk.



The many tall windows and a massive solarium
on one side of the home meant that there
would be plenty of natural light within.
It was very pretty, if somewhat eclectic,
Aimi thought--New England clapboard and
shingle with a touch of Victorian and a splash
of modernity--and it seemed to fit
Michael very well, which probably meant
he had a hand in designing it.



The morning was steadily advancing and
Aimi was becoming concerned about more
prosaic things like her bladder and stomach
when she heard a soft footfall behind her.
She turned, expecting to see Michael.
Instead a solid, middle aged man jumped as
she turned to face him, his black eyes wide,
his mouth open.


His crewcut hair was black with strands of gray,
as was his neat moustache.
He was dressed in a simple white shirt
and a black vest, pants and shoes, a red
paisley tie snugged at his throat.



“Oh," Aimi said in surprise. She turned to fully
face the man, who closed his mouth
and swallowed.


"He said you were different," the man said.
“He certainly was right."


"Hello," Aimi offered.
The man took two more steps forward,
closer to Aimi.




"Good-good morning," the man replied.
“Is-is Mr.Gail still asleep?
Oh, I'm so sorry, please excuse my
bad manners. My name is Brian Rodgers."


“Good morning, Mr.Rodgers," Aimi replied.
She smiled at the man and her smile was
returned. Brian was every bit an Englishmen it
seemed and perhaps a little smaller than
Michael but more bulky, although it was difficult
for Aimi to tell--all she could see for certain was
that he came up to just above her knee.
To her surprise he spoke with a clipped
British accent.


“Please Miss Warner call me Brian.
I am at your service whilst you are Mr.Gail’s
guest.”

         Shiho can't help but look down at all the small cars that are practically parked on the road, unaware that they have all stopped because of her.



         The spectators can feel the vibrations that are being caused with each step she takes, watching as her large feet, which are larger than most of the cars go by.


         At her current height, Shiho makes it to a small town within minutes. She looks around, seeing how most of the two story houses don't even reach her hips.
She begins to glow for a couple of seconds, before she fels like she is being stretched out again, her body starting to grow.


         Her hips are rising up past the houses as her legs are lengthening. Her knees ate approaching the roofs, as her growth continues. The pavement below her starts to crack from her increasing weight. Her growth finally ends, putting her at about eighty feet tall.



         Shiho looks down, seeing how the houses are shorter than her knees. "Everything keeps getting smaller," she says. Her attention is grabbed by the sounds of something approaching.

( Edit Note: for the sounds option her growth has hit a point where her body actually creates sounds but also she can kind of hear the ground/pavement etc crack and shift under her size and weight )
1141211112111214.title: A Growing Situation

choices: Try to coax her to leave the car alone
Uh Oh Shiho is growing again!
11412111121112141.content:
Shiho looks up to see a helicopter approaching her. She stares at it out of curiosity as it is hovering.



         "This is as close as I am willing to get," the pilot tells the reporter.



         The blond haired reporter looks at the camera
which has both her and Shiho's face in the shot.


"This is Brittany Collins for Channel 5 News," she introduces herself.
"First on the scene where this giant girl has just wandered into a neighborhood." She looks back at Shiho who is smiling apparantly amused.



"Reports have been heard about a "little" girl who is about fifty feet tall, though she does seem to be bigger than that. She does not appear to be dangerous, but one can wonder what she will do."



         "Hello," Shiho says, waving.



          Britanny waves back at Shiho. She then grabs a megaphone, "Hello, what is your name?"


         "My name is Shiho," she answers.


         "Can you tell us why you are so big?" Britanny asks.


         Shiho shrugs her shoulders, "I don't know. I wished I was a big girl. But now I think I'm too big."


         "A wish?" Britanny mouths out of confusion. She then watches as Shiho picks up a car, as if it was a toy.


         "Toy car," Shiho says. She then sits down, breaking a fence as she sits in someone's yard, now rolling the car around.
11412111121112141.title: BIG News

choices: Shiho grabs another car to play with.
Shiho has  to go to the bathroom
Peoples reactions to Shiho from the news broadcast
114121111211121411.content:
Shiho is rolling the car along on the road, the wheels now spinning freely because of how the giant girl is forcing it along the road. She is unaware of how the vehicle's body is bent where she is holding it.


         "Should we try and stop her?" The pilot asks.


         "No," Britanny answers, watching as the eighty foot tall child is playing.



"This is perfect, stay focused on her." Britanny turns her mic back on as she continues to report.
"As you can see, even though Shiho is massive in size, she is still a sweet, innocent little girl. Playing with a vehicle like it is a toy.



         Shiho picks the car up, zooming it through the air, making plane noises as she does so. As she is playing, the vehicle slips from her grip and falls, landing in the road, upside-down. The sound of metal crunching and glass breaking can be heard.


"Uh-oh," she says looking down at the now ruined vehicle.


         The occupants of the helicopter watch with bated breath, waiting to see how Shiho is going to react. But instead, they see Shiho’s body glow for a second.


"Did you get that?" Brittany asks. They then watch as Shiho is starting to grow in front of their very eyes and on camera still.


         Shiho is starting to take up more room, her butt sinking into the ground a bit as her weight is increasing. Her one outstretched foot is being pushed into a house, breaking the wall as it is being pushed through.



After hitting a hundred and twenty feet tall, she stops growing. Shiho looks around, confused as to why everything got smaller again.


         "Holy shit," Britanny says. "Did you just see that?"

Shiho looked down then to her sides.
The awkward spot she had stopped in was

Shiho’s growth was just enough that her hips
and buttocks were soundly wedged between the
4 corners of 4 of the best most sturdy built buildings
in a 1400 mile radius the owners sparing no expenses
and far exceeding regulations requirements
or any rational fortitude.


Shiho struggles again and wiggles but it’s no use.

The news copters are recording and the reporter that
interviewed Shiho earlier spoke.


“For the folks tuning in at home we caught up again
with the giant little girl identified earlier as Shiho.
As incredulous as it is the girl continues to grow.
Now however it appears the poor girl in
addition to her size plight and forced lack of
modesty has gotten herself stuck at the financial plaza.”


The camera showed Shiho’s grunts and struggles
yielding zero results.


Shiho frowned, realization beginning to sink in.
She made another failed attempt to free herself.

She was nearing the point of admitting defeat.
She flashed back to her earlier interview.

“Too big”
she said.

1141211112113.content:
Luckily for Shiho, the exit doors are a lot more accommodating for her, allowing her to crawl outside with relative ease.


Shiho is sitting in the front of the building, watching her mother talking to the doctor.


"So now what?" Alice asks.


"Not much that we can do except wait and hope that her height stabilizes,"the doctor says.


"That's it?" Alice asks.



Shiho's body glows for a brief moment once again. "Mommy, I feel funny again," she complains. Shiho is already growing again, her latest outfit already shrinking on her. The fabric is tightening around her body, becoming form fitting on her. Her head is rising up higher, approaching the second story windows.



Alice and the doctors can only watch as the five year old is continuing to grow, the makeshift outfit starting to tear on her as it is becoming grossly undersized on her. Her shirt looks like a tube top and her skirt just barely reaches her knees. They all breath a sigh of relief when the now thirty foot tall girl stops growing.


"Just wait?" Alice says, looking at the doctor. "And just how big will she be when her body decides to stop growing.


Just then someone runs up to them.
“Hey we got that security footage from your home” says the guy.

He’s carrying a computer with a DVD in it.

“We found out what Shiho wished”

He plays the video.
It shows Shiho looking out her window sad then excited.
The moment of truth comes.

“I wish I was grown up, I wish I was big, I so big that no one in the universe could ever call me or treat me little ever again! I wish I was very big! I wish I was so big no one could call me a little kid”

“Good heavens why wasn’t she more careful with her wish” said a nurse.

“She’s just a child” countered another nurse.

“My heavens my little girl is never gonna stop growing is she” panics Alice looking at her 30
foot not so little girl.

Next...

114211.content:
Matt's sister is only 2, making her quite the handful as a toddler. shes always been mischievous and playful...and kind of mean Matt just wishes she could grow up and be more mature, though she was just a toddler.



However one faithful day while he was home alone, (watching Sara of course) hear a knock at the door, he cautiously answered it seeing as he was only 17 and heaven forbid it was some sorts of sales person or mail delivery that his parents had to sign.



oddly enough it was a cloaked figure at the door, it was 7:00 PM so this was odd to see anybody at this door. Matt asked what the man in the cloak wanted or.. at least he though it was a male, he couldn't tell under the cloak.



However instead of an answer, the cloaked figure hands you an amulet... odd but you accept it as to not be mean, and in a raspy voice the cloaked figure says in a raspy voice, still unable to tell the gender of this person "Careful what thou wishes for boy, take it seriously" And with that the figure walked off into the falling darkness.



You snicker at the thought, closing the door, and you begin to inspect the amulet, on the back it was inscribed with, " One Wish, Make it and hold the amulet forward" you laugh again thinking its some kind of joke, but you decide to humor it, and you make a wish.

114222.content:
It was a seemingly peaceful and normal day in Metropolis. Kevin and Krypto were watching his little sister Melanie. The two of them had decided to take the toddler to the park near Lex-Corp Towers.



Melanie began to play in the sandbox.


Meanwhile inside Lex-Corp Ignacious Alex's pet Iguana/Lizard was in 1 of the science labs eating his usual snacks. The staff were out of the office.


Soon Ignacious became cross.

"Blech I'm sick of the same old freeze dried crickets. I need some variety in my diet." He huffed. He then easily got out of his tank.


Ignacious began looking out Lex's telescope then he spotted a caterpillar on a tree branch of a tree not far from Melanie and the sand box.


"Ooo yummy a different kind of dinner but a little small. Hmm I bet that growth Ray ol Lex made would make it into a full course meal"


With that Ignacious headed over to a large laser device.
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/72...

Without looking Ignacious hastily climbed on and moved the devices aim to out the window without looking. He accidentally fired off a shot.

The beam traveled out the window however was locked onto another target.

Kevin and Krypto were distracted by Kevin's friend slash crush Andrea.
The beam struck none other than Melanie who was building a sandcastle.

"Huh something tickle me" she said stopping her castle building in the sandbox.

Meanwhile Ignacious was getting annoyed.

"Hey why isn't this thing working? Let's try again"

This time Melanie also noticed something more.

Iggy on the other hand was noticing nothin happening.


"Hey it's not doing anything? Wait a minute the aim is off! If I'm not firing up lunch then what am I doing?"
He adjusted the viewfinder to where the beams aim was.

He watched the results.

"Aww pretty light go bye" whined Melanie

With that he slank off.


Meanwhile Kevin stopped drilling over his crush.
He decided it was time to go back home.

"Ok Melanie time to go home"

With that he and Krypto walked her home.

1151.content:
Dr. Vockorov was your typical German-America scientist once upon a time.
A top researcher in genetics, metabolics and certain other medical fields.




His work was so good and promising that it wasn't a huge surprise when the government enlisted him for a few years. Unfortunately some research had hit a snag and the government decided to shut him down and consficate his research. Now Dr. Vockorov was by no means violent however the stresses under the military watch and them taking large portions of his work had driven him mad.



He did reconstruction on himself to be unrecognized when he fled government custody after being
"Temporarily placed on inactive civilian duty"




It seemed his disguise was working.
The mad Doctor continued his research in secret claiming it was for the good of man but his work secretly was laced with malice, oh how he wanted to get those army and governmental beuracratic imbeciles back. Sure his research had setbacks and risks, sure there were questions of ethics and most of all yes finding suitable willing test subjects may of been unfruitful but those fools could of at least tried his idea to lie and trick the test subjects.



To him it was not that much different than placebo use and besides he was desperate. He knew all too well what happened in this top secret group if a government scientist doesn't perform, deliver results or worse totally displeases them.



In secret the doctor had finally perfected "it" the results of much work or so he thought.

At the last the _______________________
was ready for testing even if it had to be an unwilling unsuspecting victim.

At the last the enlarger as they had dubbed it
was ready for testing even if it had to be an unwilling unsuspecting victim.


But who is the victim or what happens next. The doctor goes out in search of a victim out of desperation.


Their reasons were mixed and not always clear but the device had been designed to enlarge only females. Some of the research team being pervy and others reasoning it would be supposedly easier to control the "enlargee" the ideal perimeters for subjects was girls ages 14 and younger
15 or 16 tops as a last resort.


On his search he decided to go to a small queit town a fair distance from the city and the lab.
Thankfully it wasn't too small as he got hungry near the end of his drive.

There was also a place to sit and eat. He decided to do so taking the Enlarger with him. There were some targets here or he could wait till after his meal and check out more of the town.

11515.content:
Kimiko was already an accomplished
Lab assistant at the age of 16 with
real promise. She hadn’t always been
this smart though.
Kimiko was a Japanese-Asian girl.


One day however testing things at her
lab would set about a life altering chain of
events.


A beaker with an experimental youth serum
busted and splashed all over the teen.
In mere minutes the serum worked reverting
Kimiko in age from 16 back to
where she could still walk and talk
but also would be young enough to be
pushed in a stroller and just finished
potty training.
( somewhere between 3 or 4 )


Kimiko panicked and once the physical part
part of the transformation completed could
feel her mind slipping next.

She struggled to focus and grabbed a beaker
of experimental growth serum.
Alas her mind had reverted almost completely
now as another assistant comes in.


She quickly realizes what happened as
the now regressed Kimiko speaks.

“Make biggah again” she said holding the
beaker.


The assistant noticed Kimiko had cut herself
but knew what to do.
She grabbed Kimiko some little girl clothes
and put Kimiko inside a pod like chamber.


The assistant then hooked the beaker into
the machines liquid intake.
She failed to check the contents fully
only noting the word “growth“

She activated the machine then called the
head scientist to inform him and write an
accident report.

Inside the pod like chamber the growth serum
gets turned into a vapor like mist and
Kimiko inhales it all.

40 minutes later the other assistant and
Doctor Jones come to find Kimiko
healed but oddly still a child though somethin
seemed slightly different to the assistant.


She shrugged it off and opened the pod to
find Kimiko sucking her thumb cutely.


“Where mommy” she asks.

The assistant tries to console her
but fails apparently not being good with
children.

“Don’t worry Kimiko everything will be
all right”


Kimiko doesn’t trust her.
She gets frightened and runs off
unaware of what was going to happen.


She sneaks out of the facility and onto
public streets.
She soon finds a house with the door open
and goes in.

Inside Kimiko finds some snacks and starts
eating however in a few minutes she
begins to feel strange.


She feels dizzy, and sore and gets a headache
and then she stumbles into a bedroom.
Suddenly her clothes begin to feel tighter.


Kimiko is confused as the changes take
place but soon the tightness distracts her
as it’s getting to be a bit much.


Then as whatever was happening continued
her clothes began to tear.

Minutes later an embarrassed Kimiko
stopped undergoing changes and knew
she had to deal with the sudden draft.


As luck would have it she found clothes for
a child easily 2 or 3 times her age.


Kimiko got dressed with some difficulty
and hasn’t realized yet she’s gone through
2 growth spurts and now looked too tall
for her age or what her face and features
conveyed.


Kimiko then began to suck her thumb as
she pondered what to do next and why
strange things seemed to be happening to her.


She then remembered she needed to
stay away from the strange lady and man
in the strange place and maybe find her
mommy.


Sadly Kimiko’s memories gone and with
the age regression she’s unaware
she’s an orphan her mom having
died when she was 14 the 1st time.

Based off
https://www.writing.com/main/interact/ci...
---------/---//---//---/-------/-----------/-------/----//--------/-------/- ----/--


18 year-old Maya comes home from work one day from her job as a waitress exhausted and tired, heading back to the house she takes care of while her parents are away during long periods of work. What she doesn't know, though, is that she is also carrying in her purse a little bottle of perfume given to her by one of the people she waited on. She was told that whoever smells it would change before their eyes. Maya, not believing in that sort of stuff, leaves it on the top of her bureau in her bedroom. Will Maya eventually check it out again, or will one of her little sisters stumble onto it instead?

Bios of the three sisters:

Name: Maya
Age: 18
Height: 4'11"
Hair color/length: Short, brown
Eye color: Brown
Description: A short, slight clumsy girl who works as a waitress to pay her way through college. She's always smiling and willing to help others, though she resents her tiny, flat body.

Reference pic: http://tsuyoshi-kun.deviantart.com/art/W...


Name: Aya
Age: 15
Height: 5'6"
Hair color/length: Long, black in twin braids
Eye color: Green
Description: A tall, pretty, popular girl in her first year of high school, Aya also gets really good grades. She wishes for a boyfriend, but wants one that's interested in her mind and not in her curvy body.

Reference pic: http://tsuyoshi-kun.deviantart.com/art/W...


Name: Saya
Aget: 8
Height: 3'10"
Hair color/length: Dirty blonde, down to the middle of her back
Eye color: Blue
Description: A petite, adorable little girl, Saya is the youngest sibling in her family. She wears a big ribbon in her hair, a gift that Aya gave to her when she was 5. She also carries around with her a stuffed animal, a gift from her oldest sister Maya. She loves her sisters very much, but is shy around other kids her age.

Reference pic: http://tsuyoshi-kun.deviantart.com/art/W...

1153211.content:
Maya came home from a long day at work. She quickly headed up the stairs and changed, changing into a
black t-shirt and jean shorts. As she changed, she remembered the quartet of perfume bottles a customer had given her earlier. They had no name or stickers on them, but the person, an old man, told her that one just one spray would change her or the target greatly.


Each bottle of perfume was quite big and had a different color.
There was Pink, Blue, Green and Yellow.


"Yeah right", Maya scoffed at the perfume bottles as she left them on her bureau. She then went downstairs to watch some T.V.


But in a house with three siblings, word gets out fast about stuff you see lying around. It just so happened that Maya's sisters overheard their eldest sister talking about the perfumes.


They were curious about the description Maya mentioned and blew off.


Perhaps one of them would spray one of perfumes onto themselves, or would Maya herself take back what she said earlier and do so instead?

11532113321.content:
**credit to a User named rain man from this story https://www.writing.com/main/interact/it... **

--------/-----------/-----------/--------/-------/---------/-----/

"Now who could that be?" Aya said as the door continued to be knocked. Aya tried to get up only to fall back down. Aya frowned and mumbled as Saya giggled.


"I'll get it!" Saya said as she ran to the front door. Aya heard Saya drag a chair and stood on top of it. Saya peered through the peephole then went back down and pushed the chair back to its place. The door had a chain look so Saya could only open it a bit.


"Who is it, Saya?" Aya asked as she finally got up. She slowly made her way to the door but hid behind it.

"It's Mrs. Freed." Saya said as Aya peered through the door. There she saw a mid-30s woman with her auburn hair in a Bob cut. She seemed to carry a two-year old girl who had long brown hair and a white dress.


"Oh hey, Aya!" Mrs. Freed said as she smiled. The child seemed asleep.


"Hey Mrs. Freed. What are you doing at this hour?" Aya asked as Saya stood at her side looking at her older sister then at Mrs. Freed.

"I heard you were free for babysitting so I was asking if you could babysit Sandra for me." Mrs. Freed said as if she was a pleading.


"What seems to be the problem, Mrs. Freed?" Aya asked as she seemed concerned.


"A family emergency. My husband is already there and I need to follow soon. I'll be back by Sunday evening." She said as she cradled her the child.


"Who's that?" Saya asked as she pointed to the child that Mrs. Freed was carrying.


"Oh this is Sandy." Mrs. Freed said.


"No problem. Seems you really need a babysitter." Aya said as she smiled. Saya looked up at her sister.



"Oh you are a godsend. Here are her things." Mrs. Freed said as Saya took the bag and set it in the living room. Mrs. Freed handed Sandy to Saya as she carried her to Aya's room. She seemed to struggle but managed to make it. Aya and Mrs. Freed exchanged numbers and soon she was gone. Aya closed the door and leaned on it.


"Phew! That was close! I thought I was going to get caught " Aya thought as she locked the door and slowly went up stairs to her room where Saya and Sandy were. Sandy was asleep on her bed with Saya at her side.



Aya went pale as she saw Saya with the perfume in hand. She had timed it perfectly as she saw she had squirted the sleeping Sandy with the perfume.


"Saya! What are you doing? Are you crazy!" Aya yelled as she walked as fast as she could and sat on her bed.


"Well. I wanted to see if the perfume was for real. So I wanted to try it out." Saya said as she placed the perfume on Aya's lamp table.


"Who knows what the perfume will do! You shouldn't play things you don't know nothing about! Even I don't know what it actually does!" Aya scolded Saya as Saya looked down.


"Great. What are you going to do now?" Aya thought as she looked at Sandy then at the perfume.
11532113321.title: Mrs Freed + 2 year old Sandy

choices: Wendy begins to have growth spurts ( even size increases ONLY )
Wendy grows older ( no mental changes )
11532113322.content:
**credit to a User named rain man from this story https://www.writing.com/main/interact/it... **

--------/-----------/-----------/--------/-------/---------/-----/

Aya had just finished her lunch as she cleaned up the plates and brought them to the dish washer. As the dishwasher did its thing, Aya leaned on the counter and folded her arms beneath her bust.


Just then the door bell rang.
Startled she check her phone which was in her pocket for messages but had none.


"Now who could this be?" Aya thought as she made her way to the front door. Peeking through, the peephole. She saw a middle age woman with long brown curly hair. She was wearing a business suit as she repeatedly check her cellphone. Aya recogznied her as Mindy. The woman who used to babysit them. Aya slowly opened the door as she hid behind it.


"Hey! Mindy! What brings you here?" Aya asked nervously as she waved. Mindy smiled while waving back.


"Big favor to ask you." Mindy said as she clasped her hands together in a pleading manner.


"Sure, what is it?" Aya asked in a puzzled way.


"I need you to babysit these two." Mindy said as a little boy and girl popped for behind Mindy. Both were brown haired with blue eyes but the girl had pigtails. She recognized them as Saya's classmates.


"Ummm.. Saya isn't here. She went with Aya to work." Aya said. "But it's not a problem with me!"


"Oh you are a god send! I'll be back tomorrow after noon. I have an out of town meeting and didn't have time to find a babysitter. Oh by the way these aren't mind, they're my niece and nephew, twins actually." Mindy said as she blushed.


"Like I said, it's not a problem!" Aya said. Mindy kissed the two on the forehead and explained what she was doing. Mindy them left as Aya closed the door. She leaned her back on it.


"Phew! That was a close. If she saw me as I am now, I wouldn't know how to explain." Aya thought as the two caught her attention. She knew what they were staring at. It was her belly.


"S-so, you guys had a snack yet? I could fix one up if your hungry." Aya asked nervously. The boy's name was Wally while the girls was Wendy.


"Why is you belly so big?" Asked Wendy as she bit her left index finger, twisting her right ankle in a cute way.

"Uh, school project. That's it a school project!" Aya said nervously as the two looked at each other.


"I thought you were fat or something." Wally said as he raised his arm behind his head.

"I hope they bought my lie." Aya thought as she lead them into the living room. Saya already had her toys there as they played with them. Aya made them some snacks as she placed them on the living room table. Aya watched TV with them as time began stroll quickly.


Aya had dozed off a she rubbed her eyes. She fixed her glasses to find the two missing. Puzzled she looked around.


"Weird. Where those two go? The toys are here and they know they aren't supposed to go out." Aya thought as she saw it was evening. Looking at the clock, it read 6:30. She slowly got up and went to the backyard.


"Not here." Aya thought. "Oh crap! I hope they didn't find the perfume!" As she ran as fast as she could, up the stairs and into Saya's room. Panting she saw that Wally had just sprayed Wendy who was making faces at the smell it created. Aya stomped towards them at snatched the perfume from Wally.


"Are you crazy? Don't you know it's wrong to use others things without permission?" Aya said scolding the two. She looked at the perfume.

"Sorry... We thought it was Saya's so we tried it." Wally said as he began to sniff. Tears welling up but Wendy was already crying.


"Okay, okay. Calm down.. Just how many time did you spray her?" Aya asked nervously. The twins looked at each other.

"Two... maybe 3 times..." Wendy said rubbing her eyes. Aya rubbed her head.


"Great, just what are you going to do to them now?" Aya thought looking at the perfume as she leaned on the two who looked at her.

Wendy was around Sara's age before the earlier incident.
11532113322.title: Mindy + the twins

choices: Ben started growing in spurts! BIG BEN!
115321133231.content:
**credit to user rainman from https://www.writing.com/main/interact/it... **

-------/___---/------/-----------/--------/---------/-------/-------/-----/- ----:/-------/----/--------/


It was around 5:30 PM on a Friday as the doorbell rang. Aya went to the door and peeked through the peephole. There she saw a familiar face.


"Mrs. Fairchild?" Aya said as she opened the door. With a smile, when greeted Mrs. Fairchild. She was at least a thirty something business woman who lived next door. She had wavy brown hair that extended last her ears. Good friends with them since they could remember. She saw she had a two year old boy she was carrying.


"Hey, Aya. I need a favor." Mrs. Fairchild said. As Aya started to play with the tyke. The tyke giggled.


"What is it?" Aya asked.


"I was wondering if you could babysit my little boy, Ben. I have to be somewhere." Mrs. Fairchild said.


"Oh no problem! Just how long will you be gone?" Aya asked as Mrs. Fairchild was overjoyed.


"Till Sunday evening." Mrs. Fairchild said. She explained somethings to Aya about Ben. She handed Aya some money and a bag full of his clothes.


"Take care of yourself, Mrs. Fairchild! Saya is going to love him." Aya said as she waved. Mrs. Fairchild waved back as she got into a taxi. Aya closed the door and went to Saya's room where she saw them playing.


It wasn't after dinner Ben was throwing tantrums. Saya and Aya tried to call him down even after what Mrs. Fairchild told her.


"Talk about a brat.." Aya said as Saya ran out of her room. He kept throwing fist and shouting until Aya saw Saya brought something familiar.


"Saya! Why did you bring that!" Aya said scolding Saya. It was the perfume! Before Aya could get it, Saya handed it to Ben who stopped crying. He looked at it with curiosity.


"See? He stopped crying!" Saya said with her achievement but Aya was different.


"I just hope he doesn't spary something." Aya said as she looked nervously. Then he sprayed...Himself a few times.

As Aya's eyes went wide with fright. Ben first sneezed and cried due to the smell. Saya grabbed the perfume before he could throw if.

"I wonder how the perfume is going to affect him..." Aya thought as she carried him. Still crying..

1153321.content:
So somehow an alien virus makes its way to earth
Now who falls victim and how?

-----------

Emily was you average 7 year old til one day some space debris changes that.
Thanks to some kids carelessness she's exposed to an alien virus
Soon she starts exhibiting symptoms of being sick
She then notices she's growing up in forced and and painful spurts
At first her and those that know just think it's height but it becomes apparent it's age too
The odd part she stops growing at age 14


Just when they think it's stopped as if sudden puberty weren't enough for her 7 year old mind
She starts growing again only this time it's only in height.
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/85...

If a cure isn't found Emily might just outgrow more than her clothes if she survives


----------

Anne
Was your typical 8 year old girl until a field trip ended in mayhem
Her friends dared her into a lab they had no business in
Inside a beaker left on a bunsen burner burst
Anne tried to clean it up and cut herself
The strange contents absorbed into her cut within seconds and oddly it healed itself
They left uncaught and unscathed or so they though


Less than a day after her field trip Anne comes down with a mild fever
But the strange part soon shows
Her hair turns silver.
And she begins having growth spurts anytime
She sneezes, feels embarrassed, feels self conscious or in auto response/defense to bring injured or her body subconsciously feeling threatened.

A look in her bedroom mirror at the changes she soon undergoes doesn't help

11533211.content:
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/85...
-------

One day Emily was playing with a group of local kids.
Unfortunately among this group were a couple of bullies.
The bullies were plotting how to mess with the girls when they all spotted something in the sky.
Tiny meteor chunks were raining down.
One not so tiny thing to fall was some odd capsule containing a mysterious liquid.


The glass container cracked on impact then shattered spilling its contents into a puddle.
As the rain of space debris stopped the kids go to get a closer look.


It was then that the head bully made his move.

"Wow what is it" Emily questions


"Here why don't you find out for us" said Tim
He then pushed her face 1st into the puddle


Emily flailed a bit involuntary ingesting dirt and the strange substance.
Faster than expected she stopped moving.


"Uhh Emily you ok? Come on I was just messing. This isn't funny"
The bullies started to panic

"Dam it Tim you went too far now we're all gonna be in so much trouble" said Jacob another boy.


"No we aren't we're gonna run like hell and pretend this never happened! Anyone squeals and you answer to me" said Tim. With that the boys ran.


The girls soon found Emily unresponsive.
The entire contents of the container except a few drops inside the unshattered portion had been ingested by Emily.
The girls ran for help.


A few moments later Emily sprung back to life.
The reprieve was short lived as she began to sweat profusely.
A small pain formed in her chest and her breathing became labored and heavy.
She also felt strange. It lasted for about a minute then stopped.


As the girls and a parent returned they were relieved to find her conscious.
They were however concerned about her sweating and heavy breathing.
They checked her forehead and found she felt a bit warm.


Picking Emily up no one seemed to notice the girl had gained 3 inches in height as they took her for care.
Little did anyone know Emily would keep on having growth spurts and the pains would eventually get worse
11533211.title: Emily's growing pains
