14131111111.content:
[ Saturday February 29 2006 7:55 AM ]
[ My Bedroom ]
[ AGE 15 ]
[ Sex (Finally + Permanently )Female ]
[ Gender TRANS Female ]
[ Species ???? ]


“It’s time to wake up, sweetie,” Mom said, gently stroking my cheek.


“Already?” I asked, slowly opening my eyes.


“The spell must have taken a lot out of you. You were practically asleep when that movie ended,” she said softly. As I became more awake, I started to stretch all of my limbs. I let out a small moan.



“That feel nice?” Mom asked.



“Uh huh,” I said. I rolled off my side and yet out a yelp when I rolled over my tail. I had almost forgotten about it. Suddenly, everything that had happened yesterday rushed to my head. My hand shot to my ears.


Mom took the hand I hadn’t raised. “Are you okay?”


I looked down, noticing the very feminine tenting on the front of my nightgown. “I just forgot that I changed yesterday.”



Mom gently stroked my hand and gave me a soft smile. “We’re here for you, okay?”


I nodded. “I think that the shock has worn off. I can handle this, especially since it means I’ll always be your daughter!”



Mom brought me into a hug. “You always were my daughter, even before this happened.”


I was so beyond lucky to have accepting, supporting parents and an accepting bestie.



A tear fell from my eye as I smiled widely. “I love you so much.”



“I love you too, sweetie. Why don’t you get showered and dressed? We still have a day planned,” she said.



My eyes widened. “Oh, we do!”



Mom gave me another worried look. “Are you worried about leaving the house?”



I felt my ears flatten against my head as I nodded. “I won’t be treated badly, will I?”



Mom smiled. “You’ll be fine, sweetie. There are a few idiots or bigots out there, but you won’t be looked down upon for simply making a mistake. Okay?”



I nodded. “Thanks, Mom.”



She smiled again. “I’m going to go prepare us some breakfast. Come down when you’re ready, okay?”



I smiled and nodded. “Okay.”



Before Mom left the room, she turned to me. “Will you have clothes to wear to the mall?”


“They won’t fit perfectly, but I think so. I’ll have to wear a skirt for my tail, but that shouldn’t be a problem!” I grinned.



Mom smiled. “You’ll have some things that fit after today!”




“Definitely,” I agreed. Mom left the room with me on her heels. While she went downstairs, I got a towel and padded to the bathroom. Dropping my insubstantial clothing on the ground, I was finally able to see my fully female form in all of its splendor. I smiled dreamily to myself as my eyes traced the curves I had wished to develop for so many years now.



Except for my ears and tail, I seemed to have grown no fur, but all of my hair was a slivery white that matched Belle's, the effect being that what body hair I did have almost seemed invisible on my fair skin. The thought that I wouldn’t have to shave very often crossed my mind as I started my shower. Still, I shaved anyway, marveling at my smooth skin.



As I dried myself off, my tail became a nuisance due to its ability to take on way too much water, but a hair drier worked well enough on it to dry it off. I was starting to gain greater control over moving it, which I thought would come in handy at the mall. I didn’t want it to randomly flick about and toss my skirt up!




I had already decided that I would wear a longer skirt just in case. Wrapping the towel around my torso, I dashed back to my room and started preparing my outfit. A pair of panties which finally fit the way it was meant to, a bra that was a fair bit too small, and an ordinary skirt and top combo were all I needed. It would be easy for me to change in and out of it to try things on.




Slipping on a pair of flip flops, I watched my tail lightly swish back and forth under the skirt. I wondered if I would be able to fully get used to its presence. I made it downstairs just as Mom was dishing out a classic meal of bacon and eggs.




I gave her and Dad a hug before digging in. My sharper canines ripped through the bacon like nobody’s business, and the eggs were just as wonderful as usual. Mom smiled as I patted a full tummy.


“I see that your tastes haven’t seemed to change,” she said.


“Oh, wait,” I realized, “what if there are things I shouldn’t eat because they’re bad for cats?”



“I can call Dr. Walton... And maybe search up some stuff on Google while you two are gone,” Dad answered, “I’m sure you have nothing to worry about, since you’re much more human than cat.”



“I think so too,” I said, “I’d hate to be unable to eat chocolate or something.”



“Well, we’ll probably eat lunch at the mall this afternoon,” Mom said, “do you have any ideas of what you’ll have?”


“Fish!” I cried out, without thinking. Both Mom and Dad started laughing.



“Maybe your tastes have changed,” Mom chucked. I blushed.


“Maybe they’re not changed, but just added onto,” Dad suggested.



“I suppose we’ll keep finding out new things as the days go by,” I said. Dad gently rubbed my head.



“Remember what Dr. Walton said,” he said, “your new instincts may seem overwhelming at times, but you’re still you.”


I nodded. “I’ll keep that in mind.”


Mom placed her hand on mine. “Is our daughter ready to go shopping?”

I stood up. “Definitely!”


I then hugged my dad goodbye and unintentionally gave him a lick on the cheek. Darn these feline instincts and tendencies

"Are you ready to go Kate" asked mom once more.


"Definitely 100%" I replied enthusiastically


Mom smiled at my enthusiasm. I gave Dad another hug before heading out with her.



“How was last night’s movie?” I asked her as we started on our way.


Mom smiled knowingly. “You didn’t pay much attention?”


I giggled. “I think it was your fault!”


“You were purring so loud that we had to turn the TV up. You were so adorable,” she explained.



“I didn’t think that mere physical contact could feel so… nice,” I said, blushing slightly.



“Just wait until you’re with a nice boy,” Mom continued.


My blush deepened. “Mom!”



She laughed. “I know you’ll be looking at boys more now, sweetie. It’s nothing to be ashamed of.”





“But I’m not going to let someone fondle me just because I like being touched!” I said with conviction.



“Good,” Mom said approvingly. Right about then, we pulled into the mall and got ready to start our expedition.




We quickly learned that my tail would be a large obstacle in getting clothes for my lower half. Both of us would have to practice our sewing in order to cut holes in all of my clothes.




Panties seemed to work fine, though. I was afraid of having to cut through the delicate material. I was becoming increasingly concerned about the cost of everything, and quite curious as to why Mom wanted to talk to a manager at every store. When shopping for a few pairs of shoes, the store was small enough for me to hear Mom whisper that I was a victim of a magical accident… and the manager gave us a discount! I was marveling at my ability to hear a whisper from across a room as clear as day almost as if I were part of the whispered conversation when Mom got my attention.




“How do those fit?” she asked, regarding a pair of four inch pumps I decided to try on a whim.



“They’re so easy to walk in!” I grinned, “It’s almost like I’m more comfortable with my heels up than flat!”



“Feline grace?” Mom chuckled.


“I don’t know,” I said.


“Do you like the shoes?” Mom asked while watching me walk some more. It was so effortless that I wondered why Kate claimed to have so much trouble.



“I like them, but don’t we already have enough? I don’t want to cost too much money…” I said.


“You’re doing fine, sweetie, and we can get the shoes,” Mom assured me.



“Why do you keep talking to the store managers?” I asked, even though I already knew. I wondered if she would even tell me.




“Many businesses give generous discounts to those who require large wardrobe switches as a result of a magical accident. I was just telling them that you were recently transformed into a girl,” she explained.



“So that’s why you aren’t afraid to splurge,” I said.


Mom hugged me. “I would have tried to splurge even if we had to pay 3x full price.”


I sighed into her hug. “Thanks.”


“Now, I think we might be about done here. Why don’t we get some food?” she asked.


“That sounds great,” I said, giving her a smile.


I took Mom’s arm as we started to walk toward the food court. As we walked, I noticed that I was getting some looks, but none of them seemed threatening. Some of the boys even seemed to be checking me out! I smiled at Mom.


“It looks like you were right about my appearance,” I told her.



Mom simply smiled as we got to the food court. True to my outburst this morning, I honed in on the nearest kiosk selling something related to fish and stocked up.



I got a fish sandwich, some popcorn shrimp and tuna melt with bacon and cheddar. I was quite hungry. Luckily mom didn't seem to mind and the teenaged boys working there slipped us a discount, extra fries and shrimp when the boss went into the back.




Mom and I had sat down at a table when we spotted a familiar face. Mrs. Baker caught sight of us, too, and decided to sit with us.



“Hello, Christine!” A familiar elderly woman greeted us.


“Hello, Linda,” Mom happily replied.


“Now, who is this young girl you have with you?” Mrs. Rosa asked.



“This is Kate, my daughter,” Mom said proudly. Meanwhile, I was trying to disappear before Mrs. Rosa realized that I was not only Kyle, but had hair the same color as her Belle.

“Oh? I thought Kyle was your only child,” Mrs. Rosa said.



Mom looked at me apologetically, realizing that she had taken an initiative that I probably should have taken instead.


“Um, Mrs. Rosa , I ~am~ Kyle,” I said. "Or at least I used to be. Sorry"



She looked at me up and down, and gasped. “Oh, dear! You had an accident, didn’t you?”



I hoped I could trust her with my secret. “The truth is that the spell was supposed to make me a girl, because I’ve always felt that I was one, even as Kyle… but I accidentally got some of Belle's hair in it, the other day and this happened.”



“Oh, my goodness I’m so sorry dear,” Mrs. Rosa said.



I shook my head. “It’s not your fault. I didn’t have to come and pet Belle yesterday.”



She smiled then pulled me into a hug. It seemed like her Latino-Italian heritage had made her a big hugger at times. "You're such a brave and nice girl, magnífico! Still I'm a so sorry. I make it up to you next visit to my house I'm a make you the best seafood pasta you ever had and I won't take no for an answer"



I smiled and looked back and forth between mom and Mrs. Rosa. "Thanks I appreciate the offer. It's always a pleasure visiting you and Belle"



"Anyway your feelings would explain quite a lot, you always did seem a little detached when we saw each other. You look very nice, dear, even with your gifts from Belle.”



“…Gifts?” I asked.



“Of course. Appearance is such a fickle thing. You’re unique! Promise me that you’ll take pride in yourself. Make an old woman proud.”



“I… well… I’ll try my best,” I said, breaking into a smile.


Mrs. Rosa smiled and started to stand. “Well, I’d best not keep you from your lunch. I hope to see you soon, Kate.”


“I’ll come by next week!” I promised.


As she left and we started eating, I couldn’t help but think about what she said to me… about being unique. I concentrated on the slight movements of my tail and the twitching of my ears as they instinctually moved to hear the sounds around me.



Take pride in myself, she said. I didn’t ask for these “gifts” from Belle, but they were part of me now, weren’t they? Could I ever truly accept these features as part of me? I didn’t know. I leaned against Mom for comfort and began to purr when she hugged me to her side.

Mom and I got back home shortly after our lunch. Dad wasn’t surprised by the many bags we had in tow, but he did question why I seemed happier. I told him about our meeting with Mrs. Rosa and about how my concerns about money were unfounded due to our discounts.




I wanted to start working on the car with him soon, but I knew that wearing a skirt in the garage would be a bad idea, so I had to sew a hole in at least one pair of pants. Mom and I got to work on it right away.



After a bit of experimentation, we were able to create a hole in back that I could open or close with a snap on button, allowing ample room for my tail. Mom continued to work on my clothes as I went to the garage, where I hoped Dad was.


“Dad?” I called out, my voice echoing in the smallish room.


“Over here, Kate,” he called out, “are you ready?”





“Yeah! Mom and I fixed up a pair of jeans so my tail wouldn’t get squished,” I said, approaching him. He looked at it swishing slightly behind me.



“You two did a good job,” he said. I beamed and started to get some gloves on.


We were working on an older Volkswagen Beetle as a father-son project, although I always thought of it as a father-daughter project.



I knew that it wasn’t considered “feminine” to know a lot about cars, but I enjoyed it and liked that I would know how to deal with breakdowns once the car was passed to me. Plus, it let me spend quality time with my Dad! Besides I could still have tomboyish tendencies right? Stereotypes be damned!



We finished the engine today, so it was almost ready to be painted. Since I was going to get my license soon, I figured that we’d finish the car just in time for me to be the first to drive it.


“You did well today,” Dad said as we started to clean up.


“Thanks, Dad. I’m glad that we’re doing this together,” I said, taking off my gloves. I noticed that some oil had gotten on my arm, and my entire body shook as I stopped a sudden urge to lick it.


“Is something wrong?” Dad asked.



“I saw the oil on my arm and almost started to lick it off,” I said.


Dad helped me to quickly wipe it off. “We’re going to have to be careful with that particular instinct,” he said. I nodded in agreement.


“I think I’ll go take another shower, just to make sure everything is off,” I said.


Dad rubbed my head. “That’s a good idea.”



I smiled at the contact and made my way into the house for my second shower. I came out in an ordinary shirt and skirt combo and started to help Mom with dinner. As I was cutting up more steak, I saw Mom look at me oddly.



“Sweetie, why are you standing on your toes?” she asked.



“Huh?” I asked, feeling my heels suddenly hit the floor. “I was standing on my toes?”



Mom nodded. “Were you doing it on purpose?”



I shook my head. “I didn’t even know I was doing it.”



Mom smiled. “I guess we know why you’re so comfortable in heels.”



“Cats walk on their toes, don’t they?” I asked, not completely sure.



“Yes they do, sweetie, and it seems that your body prefers to walk that way, too,” she said.



I sighed. “I’m sure we’ll keep finding more and more of these nuances over the next few days.”



“I wonder if you’ll always land on your feet if you fall?” Mom said with a light tone.



“I don’t plan on testing that one!” I said, causing us both to start laughing. I shared a hug with Mom before going about the rest of the night. Before I knew it it was time for bed. My 1st full day as a 100% honest to goodness female was complete albeit it part cat to boot.

I was awakened the next morning at the insistence of my phone ringing in my ear. I answered it as I performed my morning stretch.


“Hello?” I asked, fighting off my grogginess.



“You didn’t call yesterday!” Amy’s voice blared from the other side. Now I was awake! Damn looks like these heightened senses such as hyper hearing can be a double edged sword.



“Sorry! I had a busy day yesterday,” I said, defending myself.



“You should know better than to…” she started to lecture, then paused. “Wait.... Kate? It’s Sunday. Why do you sound like a girl? Are you going for the full 48 hour limit?"


“Um, about that I can explain,” I said, suddenly feeling like a child being berated by her mother.


“You had an accident, didn’t you?” she asked.


“I accidently got some hairs from my neighbor’s cat into the spell,” I said.


“How much did you change?”


“Ears, eyes, teeth, and a tail. I also seem to naturally walk on my toes. Oh and heightened senses, awareness, hearing, taste, etcetera. Everything else is mental. I can purr, too,” I explained.


“Oh, that’s not too much. It’s less than Sally!” she said.


“Dr. Walton told me that I’m lucky to have changed so little.”


“You don’t seem too torn up about it,” Amy observed.



“I was at first, but I’m trying to get used to it,” I said, “and plus, I’m permanently a girl now!”



“Lucky in more ways than one!” Amy cheered.



“You’ll be able to see the new me tomorrow,” I said.


“You’re coming back so soon?”


“Why not? It’s not like I’m sick or anything.”



“Well, I just thought that accident victims were granted some kind of acclimation period or something.”



I sighed. “It’s called the weekend. I was told to start school again tomorrow.”



I heard a light knocking on my door.



“Um, I need to hang up. I’ll see you tomorrow, Amy"!


Oh? Bye!” came the slightly confused answer. I hung up the phone and called for Mom to come in.


“You’re up early,” she said with a soft smile.


“Amy called me. I forgot to call her yesterday,” I said.


“She wanted to hear your voice after the spell?”


I nodded. “She’ll be hearing it a lot now!”


“I’m sure she will. We’re going to head to your school today to make sure the administration knows about your situation,” she said.


“Okay,” I said, “I’ll shower and be right down for breakfast.”


Mom smiled and left me to my devices.
The trip to the school was far less exciting than I expected it to be. Yes believe it or not on this version of earth everything is open 7 days a week 365 or 366 days a year yep even holiday's.


Our earth believes in productivity and found reasons for things to be open more. We even have like 20 times more places that are open 24 hours than most known earths out there. In the case of schools tho it's just the Administration buildings that are open students and most faculty get off weekends and holidays. Sure many places spend more on extra staff willing and able to do weekends and holidays but our earths people have found ways to make up that expenditure.



I think magical practices have helped since it can be profitable even without being a fully practiced full on fully licensed MP, AMP, MTP or something like that. Anyway I'm getting off topic.



All of my records were changed to reflect my new self and I was advised to speak up against any discriminatory actions against me.



Per my request, any faculty who knew me as Kyle would know that I was now Kate, but I left it up to myself to inform individual students at my discretion. The administration staff were fine with it.



The real exciting trip would be tomorrow, when my friends and classmates saw the new me.


Until then I had some of my Sunday left. It was now noon.
Me and mom stopped off at 1 of those health food type restaurants for lunch.


It was called "The Salad Bowl"



I got an extra large salad with lots of extra Shrimp, bacon, and tuna.i also got some ham, turkey , grilled chicken and smoked salmon.
They had a build your own salad bar.
God I really did love my meats, poultry, fish and seafood now.


I also got a side of lobster and crab salad.



I noticed that my appetite and metabolism seemed to increase tho the latter was hard to notice after less than 2 days. I wasn't sure if it was to fuel the heightened senses or maybe cause Belle was 1 of those cats that tended to eat a lot.


Either way I happily enjoyed the meal.


We returned home after lunch. I decided to catch up on some of my shows I was behind on. Our technology thankfully while not the most advanced is a few years or so ahead of Earth 1 and some of the other earths.


I borrowed my dad's iPad Air and used our WiFi to watch some Pokemon ( don't judge me )
America's Got Talent, Family Feud and a few movies on Netflix. Thankfully our Netflix is better too. There's ONLY 1 worldwide version no regional locks, restrictions or favoritism.



The rest of the day was pretty uneventful save me chasing a mouse. Damn feline instincts again.
At least it got dad to call an exterminator and mom was on one hand happy I'd rid us of the mouse yet appalled that I held it in my hands before the exterminator rid us of it. Thankfully this particular extermination company was one of the few that had great rates, availability and had incorporated magical remedies into their arsenal.


In a matter of a few hours we were rodent free and $75 poorer. Okay we aren't poor but we aren't crazy rich. I'd guess you'd say we are middle or upper middle class.


Mom and dad both work but mostly dad brings home the bacon so to speak.

Mom only works part time and mostly from home. Dad works slightly more than full time.



Anyway before I knew it another day had come and gone.
It was bed time once again.
141311111111111.title: Chapter 4 ( reserved )

choices: 1st day of school as a girl ( reserved. )
1413111111111111.content:
[ Monday March 3rd 2006 7:17 AM ]
[ ]
[ AGE 15 ]
[ Sex + Gender - Female ]
[ Species ???? ]


Dressing for school the next day, I was disappointed to find that the white skirt I was planning to wear was one of the few items of clothing that we weren’t able to alter for my tail just yet.




Nevertheless, I decided to wear it anyway since it was a skirt, not pants. A conservative blouse finished the outfit to proclaim my new femininity to the whole world. After sharing breakfast with my family, Mom dropped me off at school.




I hesitantly walked into the halls and immediately found them full of people. Thankfully, not many were paying attention to me. As I walked to my locker, I noticed a trio of boys whispering behind me.




“Yo, look at that catgirl,” one said. It was obvious that they felt that I couldn’t hear them. Not too bright of them if you ask me. Then again maybe they're just that cocky and over confident.



“Yeah. She’s kind of hot. Look at the way she’s walking on her toes. It’s almost like she’s wearing 4 or 5 inch heels!”



“I bet that if we just give her a good scratch behind the ear, she’ll put out!”



“Yeah. All we have to do is pet her, and she’ll do anything we want. Dude, go talk to her. Try to get a date.”



I heard a high five behind me, shocked at the conversation I just heard. I was not just some toy for their amusement! I was silently fuming at my locker when one of the three boys approached me.


“Hey,” he said.


“Hello!” I replied, with a fake smile.


“You new in town?” he asked.


“Sort of. I’m Kate,” I said.



“Jack,” he said, “maybe I can show you around sometime after school.”



“And maybe you’ll want to take me to dinner, scratch behind my ears, and see if I can purr?” I asked.



“Um, well, only if you want to,” Jack stammered. I fought the urge to smile at how flustered he was.



I leaned toward him. “I have a better idea. Why don’t you tell your perverted friends that I’m not going to fall for any of their schemes?”


“You… you heard us?”


“Every single word,” I said.


Jack turned white as a ghost , said nothing and backed away. I smiled as he practically ran back to his friends, complaining that I heard everything they said. I continued to listen when I felt someone grab my tail.



I quickly turned around and, with a very non-human hiss, readied myself to scratch with my nails. I gasped when I realized who was behind me, putting my hands over my mouth.


“Amy! Don’t do that! I almost attacked you!” I cried. Her eyes went wide.



“I’m sorry Kate!” she said, “I didn’t think it would bother you that much!”


“I didn’t think it would either,” I admitted.



“You mean that you did that on instinct?” she asked.



“Uh huh. I have a lot of funny little instincts now. For example, I start to get nervous and depressed if I don’t get some physical contact every once in a while,” I said.


“Like this?” Amy asked, barreling into a hug. I hugged her back with equal fervor.


“Exactly!” I said.


“Well, what happens if I do this?” Amy asked, gently reaching up and scratching behind my ear. I let out a soft sigh as she scratched away, and it took all my willpower to drag it away. Amy giggled at my reaction.



“That felt amazing,” I admitted, “if you kept it up any longer, I think I would have melted!”


Amy looked confused. “It felt sexual?”



I blushed deeply. “No! It just feels really nice! Although, it might go that direction if my future boyfriend does it…”



“Already thinking about boys, huh?” she said.


“You know me!” I giggled. Amy sighed.


“I’m so jealous of you, Kate. You’re beautiful!”



“What? Even with these extras?” I asked.



Amy nodded. “They suit you!”



“Wow,” I said, “but you shouldn’t put yourself down, Amy. You’re beautiful too!”



“Then why aren’t any boys after me?” she asked.



I laughed. “Because they thought Kyle was your boyfriend!”



I watched as Amy's eyes widened, narrowed, and twinkled at my truth. “Oh my god! You’re right!”


“Oh, but be careful of those three,” I told her, pointing at the group who was talking about me earlier. “They only want one thing.”



“Noted!” she said. “So, how does it feel to finally be a girl?”



“Wonderful,” I said, smiling.



“I’m so happy for you, Kate ,” Amy said.



“Thank you so much for being there for me and treating me like a girl, even when my body didn’t match,” I said.



Amy hugged me again. The action spoke louder than words. I figured that she’d be happy to take care of any need for physical contact that tried to arise at school. We walked along to my science class, where I wondered how my lab partner would react to my change.




Tom was a nice boy, and it helped that he was kind of cute, too. We worked well in the labs but didn’t have much contact outside of them. As I entered the classroom and took my seat, he looked at me oddly.


“Who are you?” he asked.


I held my hand out. “I’m Kate.”



He didn’t touch my hand, and he brought one of them to cover his mouth. I took my hand back. “Is something wrong?”



He seemed to become flustered. “I’m allergic to cats.”



My jaw dropped as a hand raised to touch my ear. “Am I enough of a cat to trigger them?”



“I don’t know,” he said, taking his arm away from his mouth.



“Would you be more comfortable if I switched seats or something?” I asked.



He gave me a soft smile. “I think I’ll give it a chance. You aren’t completely covered in fur, so I might be safe.”



“I hope so,” I sighed.



“So… are we lab partners then?” Tom asked.



“It looks like it,” I replied.



“Okay,” Tom said, then he turned away from me. “Where is Kyle?” he asked, under his breath. It was obvious that he intended for me not to hear him, so I pretended not to.
1413111111111111.title: Chapter 4A ( reserved )

14131111111111111.content:
[ Monday March 3rd 2006 9:13 AM ]
[ Garden Grove High School - Science Class ]
[ AGE 15 ]
[ Species ???? ]

Shortly into the class, Mr. Polanski introduced me to the class as a new student. Some people looked at my ears oddly, but most didn’t notice my tail. I did that notice another guy, Carl, seemed more friendly toward my new form than my old one.



He had combined his DNA with a fox, giving him orange-like ears similar to and yet different than my own. He also had a bushy foxes tail and canines, but I always thought they were pretty cool and interesting on him. Now that I shared a similar fate I had mixed feelings on about it.




Today’s experiment, ironically enough, had us swab each other’s DNA and give it a rudimentary examination. Tom and I were able to see that my DNA was definitely different from his besides the obvious differences in genders. Our instruments didn’t allow us to look more closely.




I watched with caution as Tom prepared a spell to replace the need for more advanced instruments. He turned toward me before starting the chant.


“Are you okay? Your ears are flat against your head,” he said.



I felt my ears pop up. “Oh, wow. I didn’t even notice that they went down. It’s just that I’m nervous about the spell.”



“Because of the spell you messed up to become a catgirl?” he asked. I nodded. “How long ago did it happen?”



I looked down. “It was actually this past Friday.”


Wow,” he said, “I heard that Kyle, my old lab partner, had some kind of big spell to cast that day too. I wonder if something went wrong with his, too.”



I leaned backwards in my seat, and I definitely felt my ears go flat again. I would definitely have to work on making sure my ears didn’t betray my emotions so often. Tom’s eyes went wide as he noticed my reaction.



“Wait. Are you… Kyle?” he asked.



Tears began to sting my eyes as I nodded. “I accidentally mixed my DNA with a female cat,” I choked, barely able to stop a tear or two from falling off my cheek. I took a deep breath before Tom answered.



“I’m so sorry,” was all he could say. I was thankful for the usual reaction to a magical accident. They happened so often that it was often completely understandable… but most mistakes didn’t lead to unwanted physical transformations.




They tended to cause a little property damage, damaging the caster in severe cases. Spells provided for school use had to be guaranteed not to hurt anybody, no matter how much of a mistake someone made.



“It’s okay,” I said, “I’m trying to get used to it.”



“You seem to be doing pretty well. You are wearing a skirt, after all,” Tom said.



“Actually, my tail gets squished if I wear pants,” I explained, attempting to create a cover that suggested that I didn’t want to be a girl.





“It’s not just that,” he continued, “you almost seem natural, not like the last guy I met who was turned into a girl.”



Could he please stop talking!? I was at my wits end trying to continue the conversation without breaking down.


“Can I trust you?” I asked softly.



“I know we never really got to know each other but—“


“Tom, Kate! Please finish your experiment!” Mr. Polanski called from the front of the room. Tom, embarrassed, turned back and began to chant the spell. Whew!



I watched as Tom’s hand began to glow, a common occurrence for observational spells. Once the spell finished, we were done with the experiment, so Mr. Polanski wouldn’t badger us about talking more.


“Looks like our DNA is identically human! Well, except that you seem to be about 20 to 30 percent cat,” Tom said.


“I don’t look like I have that much cat DNA, do I?” I asked.


Could he please stop talking!? I was at my wits end trying to continue the conversation without breaking down.

“Can I trust you?” I asked softly.

“I know we never really got to know each other but—“

“Tom, Nicole! Please finish your experiment!” Mr. Polanski called from the front of the room. Tom, embarrassed, turned back and began to chant the spell. Whew! I watched as Tom’s hand began to glow, a common occurrence for observational spells. Once the spell finished, we were done with the experiment, so Mr. Polanski wouldn’t badger us about talking more.

“Looks like our DNA is identically human! Well, except that you seem to be about 20-25 percent cat,” Tom said.

“I don’t look like I have that much cat DNA, do I?” I asked.


“My Dad once told me that if a high ratio of foreign DNA comes with small physical changes, the person will have a lot of mental changes as a result,” Tom explained.



“That explains a lot,” I sighed.


“You’re suddenly acting a lot like a cat?” he asked.



“Let’s see. I enjoy being touched and petted, I have urges to lick my arm if it gets dirty, I walk on my toes unless I’m concentrating on not doing so, I think I get surprised more easily… and I probably have more things to discover,” I said. I sighed.



“And I bet that you’re more affectionate to people you love?” he suggested.



“Definitely. Enjoying physical contact so much is definitely a plus side of all this. Mom had me so happy on Friday night that I started purring through a whole movie.”


“You can purr?” he asked, astonished.



“As well as any cat,” I said, “but it’s involuntary. I have to be in the right mood or it won’t happen.”



“You know, you probably have the best possible ratio of foreign to non foreign DNA. You seem to have all of the best qualities of a cat but you’re still human enough to have a normal life!” Tom said.



I smiled, “You really think so?”



“Yeah. My Dad is an expert on hybrids or whatever they call them these days. Oh, and another thing. How can you manage to look cute and threatening at the same time?” he asked.



My mind went in a few directions at once. First, I realized that he had just called me cute! 2nd I would need to find out the official terminology for what those like myself are called from Dr. Walton.



3rd , I wondered for a second how and why I could look threatening while I smiled. “Oh, my canines!” I said aloud.



“Forgot about those?” he laughed.


“I usually do, unless I’m eating,” I said.



“I hope you won’t want to eat me!” Tom said.


“I’m a nice cat, er… girl,” I smiled, “I’d like to think that I’ll lick before I bite.”


“I hope so. I don’t want rabies!” Tom laughed.



“I don’t have rabies!” I squealed, playfully smacking Tom’s arm.



“Oh, be careful there. I still don’t know if you irritate my allergies. It was worth it, though,” he said.



“You’ll get what’s coming to you!” I said in mock anger, crossing my arms.



Tom laughed for the few seconds before the bell rang. He held his hand out to me. “Friends?” he asked.


I smiled and carefully took his hand. It seemed like my touch wasn’t affecting him, so I shook it. “Friends,” I said. I was so glad that he didn’t continue pushing questions about my old self after Mr. Polanski interrupted us.




Before we started to leave the room, I saw him looking at us with a bemused expression. He knew who I was, so perhaps he was simply happy to see that I wasn’t a depressed wreck after my accident.
14131111111111111.title: 1st day of school as a girl ( reserved. )

141311111111111111.content:
[ Monday March 3rd 2006 10:32 AM ]
[ Garden Grove High School ]
[ AGE 15 ]
[ Species ???? ]


In my next classes, I was once again introduced as the new student, and I got a few more stares. Nobody seemed openly hostile as far as I saw, which was a good thing. Following this class I had a rare free period. I used it to see Dr. Walton. She informed me the official term for people like me was "Transmergees" and that I was what was known as a "Felio-Homos-Transmergee"



However she said since many her field watch Anime ( yes Anime is a more widely accepted and even loved medium on this earth ) for professional reasons aside from entertainment that the terms "Neko" and "CatGirl" were more socially acceptable and common. The term "Nekomimi" if we wanted to be considered more professional say at a doctors office or something along those lines.



Dr. Walton also took the opportunity to inform me that although she'd still be our family MP and my psychiatrist as well as continue her part time work at the school when she noticed a hint of fear and worry from me I'd need another doctor.



She clarified that my primary medical doctor would need to change. She said she'd stop by our house soon with referrals for a doctor, hospital or clinic that specializes in or has a department dedicated to "transmergees" treatment and care.



When lunch arrived, I was happy to sit with Any and talk about the day so far. I was also itching for some contact but didn’t want to hug a random person. I sat down with my lunch, incredibly happy that milk was available today, and didn’t have to wait long for Amy. She slipped next to me and was hugging me immediately.




Hey Kate she chimed, “How has the school been treating the new you?”


I leaned into her hug. “Just fine. Tom found out that I used to be Kyle though.”


Amy leaned back. “How did he find that out?”


I pointed at my ears. “These traitors gave me away. They flatten against my head when I’m nervous or scared… and it happened when he started talking about Kyle.”


“Ohhh… is he okay with it?”


“He was. He seems to think that I’m a little bit of a natural at being a girl, though,” I said. Other girls were starting to fill the seats around us.


“But you are,” Amy whispered.


“He almost found out that I wanted to be a girl!” I whispered back.


“If it gets out, it gets out. Say, would this make you feel any better?” Amy asked, reaching up to scratch behind my ear again.



“A-Amy… wait… what are you…” I started, but it felt so nice! I leaned against her shoulder and started to purr. Amygiggled as she continued to scratch.


“Oh my god, you’re so cute!” she cried. I was actually feeling pretty cute at the moment, so I followed my instincts and cuddled even closer to her.



When she finally stopped, I remained crushed against her for a few seconds before realizing what I was doing. I sat back up with a blush on my cheeks.



“Why’d you have to do that here?” I asked her.


“You looked like you needed a pick me up,” Amy said, “and you can’t tell me that you didn’t enjoy that!”



“Well, no, but now everyone’s staring!” I cried. Amy looked around at all the girls smiling around us.



“Pish posh. They all think you’re cute too! Not a single one of them failed to say ‘awww” during that display,” she said.



“But I’m not sure if that’s how I want to be—“ I started, but felt something touch near my ear. Nobody could touch my ear unless I trusted them! My hand was instantly around the offending wrist, which belonged to a visibly freaked out Jack.



“What are you doing?” I asked.


“I just thought—“



“That you could give my ear a little scratch just because Amy did?” I interrupted.



He smiled. “Okay. You got me. Can you let go of me now?”



I caught him red handed, and he was smiling about it? I stood up, keeping my hand around his wrist, and hissed in his face, baring my sharp canines for him to see. “You are going to leave me alone. Got it?” I snarled.



Jack’s face paled and actually looked about ready to wet himself. “Okay, okay! I’ll go!”



I let go of him as he backed away toward his friends, who had watched the entire situation. I sat down to face a smiling Kate. A few poked fun at him. 1 could be heard be equally as as afraid as he was if not more.


"Holly crap dude she looked like she was gonna kill you right here and now" he said.



"Nah just use him as a human scratching post" jabbed another tho he was visibly concerned and quite possibly making a mental note that pissing off a female animal hybrid could be quite hazardous to ones health or worse *gulp* ones manhood.



“That was amazing! You have cat like reflexes too?” she said.


I put a hand on my throat. “Did that really come out of my mouth?”


“The hiss?” the girl to my right, Alex, asked. “If I were able to do that, I would have too!”


“But, I didn’t even think about,” I said, “it just happened!”



The hiss?” the girl to my right, Alex, asked. “If I were able to do that, I would have too!”


“But, I didn’t even think about,” I said, “it just happened!”


Amy put her hand on my arm. “It’s okay, Kate. You’re still getting used to all of this, right?”


My head hung down. “It’s just getting kind of overwhelming.”



Amy hugged me. “We’ll be here for you, okay?”


I looked up and smiled. Several of the girls around me smiled… girls whom I could call friends. They weren’t as close as Kate was, but that could change now that I was a girl.



Alexis, Jane, Sara , Tina and Sally were all very nice girls, but they didn’t know that I, as Kyle, was a girl. All 5 of the girls around me made approving sounds. Even after all of this, they accepted me?


Perhaps I could live with this after all.


Later I told Amy about today's visit with Dr. Walton.

141313.content:
Jack and Craig were drinking their troubles away in the bar. Another fruitless night leaving them both dismissed and forgotten. Tonight had been the last attempt, with both promising their friend that they were going to succeed tonight, or die trying.

Jack had promised to ask everyone he could, until he got a yes. Telling himself, he'd learn from every rebuff, every derisive laugh, every look of contempt. Craig had heard of negging, and while it didn't come naturally, he was willing to give it a shot. He'd had to google it to be sure he understood it right. Offering a compliment, at the same time as undermining a girl didn't feel like it should work. In fact, he practised a few of his lines with Jack, just as a joke. 'You don't sweat much for a fat girl.'. 'You look good compared to her.', 'You've got the tits, so I can forgive your flat ass'.

If Jack's laugh suggested what his night might entail, it fit with what he half expected. The clock was heading towards 2am, and those who'd succeeded in picking up a partner had already moved on. Jack and Craig looked deep into their glasses, and over to the bartender. The only other occupant in the bar.

A smile started on Jack's face, at some point in the night the usual guy had changed. He didn't know when but his replacement was cute. An exchanged look with Scott showed the same idea forming behind their eyes.

It would be a race to see who asked her out first. Or if the night followed the same pattern, who struck out first.

choices: He watched, as it was absorbed into the statue.

14231.content:
Dr. Jones was examining the ancient Mayan statuette. Carefully handling, due to it's age and fragility. It was crudely shaped, obviously female with exaggerated breasts and ass. She was posed squatting, as if giving birth, or just hunkering down. She rested atop a pedestal, with eight sides.

He wasn't sure it truly was Mayan, the script looked mayan, but the lettering didn't translate into anything meaningful. As if it were a later off-shoot of a tribe that went extinct, or as he suspected an earlier language from a people who went on to become the Mayans.

His fingers traced their way over the letters, feeling their shape. Hoping to somehow feel a meaning he couldn't read. The latex gloves protected it from the grease on his fingers, or the damaging effect of his sweat.

It felt like overkill, given he'd found it himself in an alcove on the outside of a temple wall. Exposed to the weather, even if protected by a coincidence of circumstances that prevented more severe erosion. But as a unique, and frankly priceless artifact, he wasn't objecting.

Thinking he was making a breakthrough he was working on an insight. A sideways look to the clock in the lab, told him it was 11:00. The surrounding silence told him that it was at night, and he was probably alone in the lab.

With a little interpretation, he'd made out the character for danger. A stylised Scorpion was on one face of the pedestal. Another face of the octagon was marked with a chararacter that meant either foolish, or hopeful. It's reading depending on some factor he couldn't decide.

Smiling to himself, he worked out the character for fertility, too. Though given the figure, it was hardly a difficult translation. The other sides remained obscure to Doctor Jones. On the base, he found a shallow engraving. Detectable only from a trick of the light, even his brushing fingers couldn't feel either the cuts in the material, or the raised edges of the embossing.

However, the half-light scattering through his lab from the corridor split into a prism, caught a distinct glyph.

Holding it steady, he shifted his head about, trying to see it from different angles, make out the meaning. Afraid if he shifted his grip the glyph would disappear and he might never see it again.

Memorising the shape, he finally had the confidence to put the statuette down. Copying the design onto the back of a lab report, he was sure he had it down as well as he could manage. Perhaps with time, the meaning would become clearer.

Patting himself on the back, and the statuette with his hand, he pricked his palm. A tiny bead of blood spilling out. Ripping off the glove, he sent the stray speck to land atop the figures' head.

14421122.content:
Doctor Helen Miller and Larry had chatted for
over an hour when they decided to run tests on
Ann.

Unfortunately there was a complication.

“Hey where is the accidental test subject”
questions Larry.


The answer came as the building shakes a bit.
Then comes a commotion in the halls.
He opens the doors to see other scientists running.

“Hey what’s going on” asked Helen.

“Doctor Helen there’s no time we have to evacuate”
says 1 of the scientists.

“Why what’s going on” asks Larry as the building
shakes again.

“Because you daft fool someone let their child
wander around and she found the experimental
Enlarger Ray in lab G3”

——-
Flashback
———

Ann had wondered into a lab with
objects she’d never seen.
She had hid under a desk curious what some
“grown ups” were doing.

She couldn’t understand most of what they were
saying but she understood them say something
about making things big.

Next thing she knew she watched them shine
a light on cherry which swelled so big the table it
was on couldn’t hold it.
The table gave way and the stopped the light
beam.


The cherry swelled for a few moments then rolled
against the wall.
It was taller than the grown ups.

“Test Alpha 771 successful but Device is still
volatile on the results. That’s enough for today”

As they left Ann was wide eyed and full of child
wonderment.

“Ooo pwetty light makes things big.
I bet the light could make me a big girl
then those mean strangers would leave me alone
and I can go find mommy”

Ann once she knew she was alone went over to
the device.
She saw a knob that had pictures for some reason.

The 1st was a dot the 2nd was a person
the 3rd was a house and the 4th a building.

Right now it was on the person.
Ann turned it to the building setting.


Next she found it had a remote.
She picked it up and saw a clock button.
She pressed it and the computer spoke.

“Big sequence active in 10...9..8...”
Ann figured it would start and stood where the table
was
“2..1.”

The light fired on her and she felt strange
and ticklish all over.
Moments later it stopped but nothing seemed to
happen.

Ann tried again.

This time she briefly aged back into her 18 year old
self as the ray fired longer than before.

“Huh what happened? Where am I and why
am I naked in from of a lamp?”

The beam then stopped.
Before Teen Ann could do much she felt strange.

“Huh? Eh- w-what’s happening.”

In mere moments she shrank back to a 3 year old.

Child Ann was oblivious to the last 3 minutes.

“Aww pwetty light didn’t make me a big girl.
Maybe I need to turn it up.”

Ann went over to the knob unaware she was now
a bit stronger. She turned the knob a bit past the building
picture with some force.
Again she walked to where she was.


She then activated the machine with the remote.
This time it seems to work.
Ann drops the remote in excitement as she swells
to nearly 4x her size in perfect proportions.

Ann was around 10 feet tall.

Ann was about to look herself over when a scientist
entered.

“I forgot my... HOLY FUCK KID WHAT DID YOU DO
AND HOW DID YOU GET IN HERE”

“Ooo you said a bad word”

“Never mind how did you get in? We have to fix
you”

“Ann sneak in and find magic big girl light”

She stepped forward and a crunch was heard.
The scientist turned pale.
The beam activated hitting Ann yet again.


Another scientist entered just in time to see
Ann starting to grow again.

“Hey what’s taking... OH MY GOD YOU IDIOT
WHAT DID YOU DO! NEVER MIND QUICK RUN”


——-
End flashback
——-

Helen and Larry were worried but knew they had to go.

They ran into the hall then away as they saw an
enlarging and faintly glowing foot approaching.

There was lots of crashing sounds and rumbling of
the building.

Occasionally they could hear loud giggling
and Ann speak.

“Tee hee big girl light tickles.
Room get too wittle”

They made it outside as Ann was clearly still growing.

How big does she get for now?

She searched and searched for something to do, but it wasn't long till she found a spot where a tree had some local graffiti sprayed on it.




It was a lame line sprayed to look like a guy's manhood. So she pulled out the purple spray can and sprayed in a circle fashion, making the ugly art into a no waiting traffic sign. Jessi smiled, but that smile quickly disappeared as the circle she made disappeared, almost like it was absorbed into it... Jessi thought this was odd and decided to pull out her next spray can, but as she went to reach for it. She dropped it on the grass and bent over to pick it up.



When Jessi turned back, the ugly mark was gone and couldn't be seen. "How odd, I could have sworn it was still here... oh well." Jessi said to herself, she walked away from it and decided not to think too hard about where it went, it was gone and that is all that mattered. Unknowingly to her, the tree had shrank a bit from the spray, which In turn made the mark smaller as well.



Jessi walked around a bit more and started to get hungry, so she decided to hit an ice cream stand that was near by. Jessi payed for her ice cream and enjoyed it very much, but right before she took her last bite of it. Someone had snatched her two spray cans and ran off with them. To her shock it was a 6 year old japanese girl! Jessi yelled at her to come back, but she had already cleared the street and was heading to the local playground.



Jessi took after her and she wasn't too far behind the little 6 year-old japaneses girl. Jessi made it to the edge of the playground and was almost out of breathe. As the little Japanese girl fell backwards, her hand pressed down on the green can. As the nozzle was facing her, she got a face-full of green spray paint. Conveniently, her gut instinct was to grab her face with both hands, thus the spray was brief. Had it lasted longer, the little girl...might quickly start becoming not so little. As it was, the little girl tried to rub the paint off her face...only to find that it had been absorbed into her skin.


Jessi watched the whole thing unfold. It was eerily just like what happened with the tree earlier... Was this disappearing spray paint or something? Whatever the case, this little thief, albeit cute, had stolen her property. And the 5'4" girl was intent on reclaiming it. So while the girl was distracted, Jessi retrieved the cans and fled, not even giving it a second thought to observe what was happening to the little girl...



Of course, it wasn't as though the changes were immediate. Again, the little Japanese girl, Lulu, only received a brief dose of the magical spray paint that neither girl with any experience with actually knew had these effects. She had accepted the loss of the spray cans and went back to playing on the jungle gym, only to find each bar slightly easier to reach and hold onto. Gradually, she was growing, but so slowly as to not really notice at first.



About 15 minutes later, Lulu had gained about maybe an inch. However, all the little Japanese girl knew was that her favorite pair of buckle shoes were starting to feel a little uncomfortable. She ignored it, thinking she might consider asking her parents for a new pair when she came home. Eventually, this was accompanied by the feeling of her panties getting uncomfortable around her hips, and the cuffs of her over-the-knee socks slightly digging into her thighs. And her chest felt a little funny...




After half an hour passed, Lulu was now a full 4 1/2 inches taller than before she got sprayed, but was still mostly oblivious to it. But she did notice that her shoes had become much too uncomfortable to keep wearing. So she did her best to take them off, but it was much harder than it should have been. "My shoes fit this morning...Stupid things...get OFF!" she grumbled and yelled as she tried to tug the shoes off her much too large for them feet. With one final herculean pull, the shoes finally came off and her feet felt much better. Now if only the rest of her could feel more comfortable.




By the time a full hour had passed, Lulu had crept up 8 3/4 inches since the little accident. Since then, she had noticed her growth finally...at least in the one area that was hard to ignore: her chest. They had swelled ever so slowly into just barely the A-cup range, but the 6 year old's brain had noticed them all the same. Come to think of it, she looked a little more like she was 9 or 10. Her bellybutton had begun to show a little more and more as the rest of the hour had passed. Her short skirt was looking a little more like a miniskirt, and was feeling tight on her. Everything felt tight on her, if just a little bit, thankfully her family bought special clothes from a friend of the family. They had a slightly more elastic and stretchable quality to them than most clothing. LuLu's family had been helping their moms friend with developing new types of fabric for clothing and clothing design. Finally, Lulu decided to...

Lulu didn't need to be told twice. Wordlessly, she complied and went inside. In fact, she was glad to. Her clothes were starting to feel weirdly tight for some reason...



With her daughter now inside, Lulu's mom turned her attention back to Jessi. "Did your parents not teach you any respect?! Did they not teach you self-restraint?! Spraying a little girl like that!" she raved angrily.




"Well if your little girl hadn't stolen my spray cans and sprayed herself in the first place, then I wouldn't have had to spray her! Maybe it's you who's the bad parent around here, lady, by letting your kid steal anything not nailed down!" Jessi argued back, temper flaring.



Of course, since the aerosol paint seemed to share the same vanishing properties of invisible ink one would buy at a joke shop, Lulu's mom had seen no trace of the teenage girl next door's claim on Lulu's clothing... Though it did look maybe a little small on her.



She might need to take her clothes' shopping soon. Regardless, she was outraged at such an apparently baseless allegation and shouted, "My WORD! Accusing my little Lulu of stealing! How DARE YOU!!! She would never steal anything she knows belongs to someone else! Even if she did 'take' your spray cans, which I doubt, then you must not have been very attentive with them and left them just sitting around where anyone would think they didn't belong to you!"




As enraged as Jessi was with this stubborn woman... she had to admit she had a point about just leaving them sitting. "Well..."




"Why, how do I know you didn't steal them yourself from another person, and my little Lulu caught you in the act?!" Lulu's mom accused.




Meanwhile, Lulu had gone up to her room, where she was watching her mom argue with the strange girl who sprayed her. She sighed. Her mom was making a big deal out of nothing... again. It was just paint... wasn't it? Sure the girl had claimed she needed to spray her because she was in danger of shrinking really small, but if that was true... why did she spray her with the same color can she had accidentally sprayed herself with back at the park?




Did she even remember which one had accidentally gone off? As her 6 year old mind attempted to make sense of this, she was also distracted by the increasing tightness of her clothes, which for whatever reason showed no sign of the spray paint at all.




Back outside, Jessi reeled at Lulu's mom's accusation that she herself had stolen the spray cans that had been delivered to her door. She hadn't stolen a thing in her life! From the vantage point in her room, Lulu watched as her mom went ballistic over being sprayed. And then the argument just went increasingly south from there. She quickly became distracted as her clothes began tearing and she could feel herself growing - and fast.



"What the...? Ow! Ow ow ow!" she remarked and then cried out in pain as parts of her clothing dug into her growing body in their valiant attempt to stay on. Valiant, but inevitably futile.




Lulu definitely noticed her breasts growing, pushing out against her shirt and causing it to ride up even worse than it was already. Her butt and hips were doing a similar thing, causing the front of her panties to partially rub up against... someplace she could only think of as extremely naughty.




Naturally, only being 6, the Japanese girl couldn't understand what she was feeling down there, but was desperate for it to stop. Eventually it did, via her panties tearing apart, the pink garment featuring Hello Kitty falling out from under her skirt which no longer covered anything useful.



When it was finally over, Lulu lay in the tattered, shredded remains of her clothes. Whatever remained immediately failed spectacularly the moment the girl dared to move, leaving her naked and so red in the face from embarrassment and crying that beets seemed pale by comparison.



Gradually, she hauled herself off her bed and measured herself by the height chart next to her door. Marking where her head came up to with a pencil just like she did almost everyday and turning around, she found herself at the 5'5" mark, way above her mark this morning. It both scared and delighted her at the same time. Looking at herself in the mirror, Lulu barely recognized the girl staring back at her.



"Where did the past six years go?" she asked, her mind clearly having been unaffected by the spray. She looked more like one of "the big kids" except still mostly childlike in many respects such as her face. She looked like a child's body parts had been transplanted onto the body of a budding 12 to 14 year old.



Lulu looked out the window once again to see if her mom and her neighbor were still arguing over something she now recognized to be... a little more than just nothing. Sure enough, they were. The Japanese girl caught a glimpse of green paint being sprayed, while the other can was sitting on a table next to the neighbor being ignored. Her young mind began forming an idea... But first, a trip into her mom's room for some clothes. They were still a fair bit loos in various places but since her own clothes wouldn't fit her at all this would have to do.


"Oh that's really mature! I'd hate to be the poor sap who gives you coffee at Starbucks that's just a couple degrees too cold, you'd probably bite their head off!" Jessi yelled in retaliation over the latest insult from Lulu's mom.





"I would do no such thing! You, on the other hand, would probably take off without paying!" Lulu's mom shouted. Both women were so blindly focused on each other that they failed to notice a certain Japanese girl doing something to the fence in the corner...


You know what? Get eaten by a bug for all I care, bitch!" Jessi snarled, having had enough. She reached for her purple can to spray the older woman until it either ran out or she shrank to a size she'd have to avoid being eaten by a mouse or something, whichever came first... only to find her hand grasping at thin air. "...Where did it go? Where did my freaking can go?!" she asked, quickly becoming agitated as she looked all around the table she swore she had left it on.



"HEY! Would you two stop acting like babies?!" Lulu shouted from right beside her mother, who was only a couple inches taller than her now.




"L-Lulu, dear?! W-what happened to you, sweetie?!" her mom gasped. "And why are you wearing mommy's clothes?"




"Oh crap... I guess that was the green spray she nailed herself with earlier. And I just made it worse..." Jessi muttered to herself. It was then she noticed Lulu holding a familiar purple can. "H-hey! How did you get that?! You little thief! That's mine!" she shouted, too flustered to notice the Japanese girl was actually an inch taller than she was.




"Sorry, mommy, but my clothes don't fit me. I didn't wanna come out naked." Lulu answered her mom apologetically, and then addressed Jessi with, "The fence opens in the corner. I'm just borrowing the can for a second. I'll give it back, promise!" The girl's first act with the can was to give both older women a very quick blast with it in the hopes to counter Jessi's previous action with the green can.



Since she couldn't tell if the green had kicked in yet or how much Jessi had sprayed, she didn't want to overdo it and get in trouble with her mom.



Nice as she thought she looked now, Lulu was fully intending to just use the can to go back to her original 6 year-old body... mostly. An couple of inches or so wouldn't be unwelcome especially since she had been previously short for her age, But looking like she belonged in middle school was just ridiculous... wasn't it? As she thought, she grew increasingly hesitant to follow through and return to normal.



Parts of her liked the new her, parts of her wanted to explore "these strange new feelings" , parts of her even comptenplate getting even bigger, maybe seeing how big she would get if no action was taken or possibly getting "super big".



For the first time ever after all she wasn't the shortest, she was taller than her "little" 4 year old nearly 5 sister for the 1st time as well. Lastly she was now big enough to make choices she thought, her mom after all as well as their neighbor now had to take notice of her. Gone was the meek, short little sometimes under spoken, easily unnoticed or ignored girl.


LuLu could be seen, heard, noticed and she was in a rare new position plus she had the cans and a choice with those too.


Finally, she gulped and took aim at herself, her finger beginning to press down on the nozzle.

1521.content:
This story takes place on an alternate Earth. Many things are the same but some are much different...

Prologue


Cryptic Cove was a prestigious boarding school in the isolated forests of the United Americas. Very few people knew it existed though it did not take great wealth to attend this school, just a skill or talent of notable worth. Rumors throughout the school, which started as a senor prank, suggested that those with incredible talents or skills seemed to disappear, never to be seen again...

Jenny Query was a senior student and had been offered to stay on as a teacher after graduation due to her ability solve any problem regardless of how cryptic or complex. She took pride in the ability to get answers to questions that had stumped even some of the most experienced professors. Little did she know her greatest challenge would be a question only she could answer for herself.

"Did you see the new girl?" Asked one teenage boy within Jenny's earshot. "She's the very first secondary school student to be accepted here."

"Yeah, I see her once and a while." Smiling, a teenage girl replied. "She's cute little thing, very shy though."

"My question is where does she disappear to?" Shaking his head, the boy remarked. "One minute, she's attending a class and the next, she's gone."

"I noticed that too." Worry in her voice, the girl replied. "It's a real mystery and no one has yet to solve it in the whole six weeks she's been here."

Jenny was intrigued. She had seen the cute little girl the two were talking about but really had not paid any attention to her. Her name was Hannah Hanson, a petite ten year old with long brown hair and green eyes. She rarely talked to anyone and when she did talk, she only said what was necessary, nothing more.

"Think I had just found my new challenge." Smiling, she thought.

Just as she began to calculate how to solve her latest mystery, she saw the petite girl reluctantly enter the boys locker room. Being a senior prefect, Jenny had the right to enter the locker room though she normally had to call it in first. This time, she did not call in as the locker room was supposed to be empty at this time of the afternoon.

"Why would she go in there, I wonder." Whispering, she muttered.

As she figured, the locker room was completely empty other than Hannah who began to remove her uniform in front of an open locker. jenny blushed slightly as Hannah stripped down to the nude then let out a sigh. "Time to switch, I guess." Softly, she squeaked.

There was a glow and Jenny watched wide eyed as the girl transformed into a ten year old boy right before her eyes! The change was quick, less than a minute, but she could see every detail of the transformation. The boy sighed, looking sad. "I'll never get used to this." Tearfully, he whispered. "What did I do to be..."

15213.content:
The boy stopped mid-sentence, seeing Jenny. His eyes went wide as he blushed terribly, knowing he was standing before a teenage girl in the complete nude. Worse, there was a terrified look on his face. His lips trembled and tears flowed in rivers. "Please!" In tears, he begged. "Please don't tell anyone! I don't want to disappear!" He began to sob loudly, shaking like a leaf. "I- I don't... I- I..."

"Calm down, sweetheart." Tenderly, Jenny said. "Why don't you get dressed and we can talk more comfortably."

The boy blushed more, if that could be possible and slowly nodded before changing into a small male school uniform. He kept a weary eye on Jenny as he did. Jenny waited patiently then motioned to a bench where they sat down together. "What do you call yourself in this form?" Curious, Jenny asked.

"Hanson Hannah." Sniffling, the boy replied.

"How long have you known you can switch between genders?"

"Mom and dad are divorced." Sadly, Hanson explained. "For a while, it was six months with him and six months with her." He wiped at his tears before adding, "Dad wanted a boy and mom wanted a girl so I sort of needed to be both and one day it happened. That's when mom put me here."

Jenny's heart skipped a beat. "He's a paradox shape-shifter." Stunned, Jenny thought. "He can literally transform into anything he feels he needs to become. Such a power is extremely rare and insanely valuable."

Jenny began to understand why the child was enrolled into her school. It was to protect him from being discovered and taken advantage of. "You're not going to tell anyone... are you?" Tearfully, Hanson asked.

Jenny sighed, wondering what to do.
15213.title: He stops, seeing Jenny.

choices: Hannah is bullied for her power.
152131.content:
"How have you been able to keep Hanson a secret?" Curious, Jenny asked. "Certainly, you are known by someone as you have a school uniform."

"Hanson is an orphan." Tearfully, Hanson replied. "He is a ward of the school and thus not officially enrolled so only a few staff members know about him."

"Leaving the students to guess that you are a visiting relative." Sighing, Jenny said. She shook her head. "Other people are bound to discover your secret but maybe I can help you in some subtle way. However, I need to trust me."

Hanson shrugged. "You know my secret so I guess I have no choice but to trust you." A few tears falling, he said. "There's nothing I can do to stop you from telling anyone."

"What if I were to share a secret of my own." After a thought, Jenny asked. "One I feared would cause me to disappear."

Hanson looked at Jenny wide eyed. "You would do that..."

If it would help you to trust me, yes." Serious, Jenny said.

Hanson hesitated. Jenny knew he was struggling with her proposition. Finally, he nodded, agreeing to her suggestion. Jenny smiled. "I have the ability to walk anywhere I want without being seen or heard by anyone even if I am standing next to him or her." Softly, she said. "There not a single lock I cannot pick, not a single computer or security system I cannot crack." She winked at Hanson. "It is part of how i am able to solve any mystery given to me."

Hanson"s jaw dropped. "Wow..." Stunned, he whispered. "Here I thought changing from boy to girl was something..."

Jenny smiled though she was worried inside. "Oh, Hanson... if you only knew half of what you were capable of." Feeling pity, she thought. Then she asked, "Will you trust me now?" Hanson nodded and Jenny pulled a radio from her belt. "Security, I have discovered an abused child." Serious, she said."

Hanson looked up at Jenny, a look of betrayal on his face and began to cry. Jenny took a firm hold of his arm, just in case he may try to run, which brought more tears. It was exactly what she was hoping for. A female security officer responded on the other line. "Is that Hannah Hanson?" Worry in her voice, she asked.

"And Hanson Hannah." Serious, you replied. "They are sharing the same place in time and space... we have a case of paradox twins."

Minutes later, Hanson, now in the form of Hannah in the girls school uniform sat in the security office with a tearful pout on her face. "I thought I could trust you..." Crying, she said. "Why did you tell on me?"

An amazon of a woman in a security uniform sat down in a bench across from Jenny and Hannah with a kind smile on her face. On her name tag was the name Fawn Cross. She was muscular with long black hair and green eyes. "You have nothing to fear, dear child." Tenderly, Fawn said. "No one here has ever vanished and, with me on the job, no one ever will."

Hannah turned to Fawn, still crying. "What are you going to do to me?" Afraid, she asked. "I know I walked into the boys room as a girl but..."

"I cannot imagine what it was like for you to be forced to use your powers to be a girl for your mother and a boy for your father." Gently, Fawn said. "Reviewing both yours and 'his' medical evaluation, it became so intense, so stressful that your boy and girl form had developed their own personality." She winced, pity in her eyes. "You are literally two people in one and it seems you can't remember which gender you were born under."

"What... what will happen to me?" Afraid, Hannah repeated.

"Well, your existing powers had been divided between your boy and girl forms." Softly, Jenny said. "You will not be as powerful as you were destined to be but you will still have abilities of worth."

"Indeed you will." Smiling, Fawn said. "In the meantime, we will enroll your male persona and categorize you and he as paradox twins."

"Categorize..." Turning pale, Hannah asked.

"It's not what you think, Hannah." Gently, you said. "Everyone is placed on lists based upon their skill or power set along with gender, age and so on."

"Paradox twins are two people who had spawned from one individual." Kindly, Fawn said. "Unlike multiple personalities which are of the mind alone, a paradox twin is a separate personality that had manifested itself into a solid form through a transformation."

Hannah paused. "I- I guess that makes sense."

"This is not the end of your journey, Hannah and Hanson." With a bemused smile, Fawn said. "This is just the beginning."

Jenny sighed. "His secret is safe, for now." Relieved, she thought. "At least until he or she learns how to summon it to the surface."

1523.content:
Miles knocked in his friends Holly’s door as he yawned looking at his phone.

—Prologue—-

Miles and Holly were old friends since middle school. They had just graduated high school and were enjoying what might be their last summer together before going off to college.

Miles was a rather nerdy guy. Skinny and tall, but not very muscular. He spent more time with computers than sports and hoped one day to work for a high end tech company. Fairly average in appearance with short brown hair Miles never stood out in any crowd.

Holly was what many people would call goth or emo. She had pale white skin but jet black hair. Her nails were painted black and she grew them to sharp points. She wore black lipstick, black dresses, black heels, and fishnet stockings almost exclusively. She also wore a silver necklace everyday that had a pentagram pendant at its center.

Even though she dressed like this every day Holly never thought of herself a gothic or emo. She hated those stereotypes. Instead she claimed she was an actual witch and that her whole family was descended from ancient witches.

This of course led to her getting teased and bullied at school. Not just for her appearance but for her beliefs as well. Miles became her only true friend when he stood up for her one day and ended up getting beaten up by a large jock named Toby. Every since that day the two of them became really good friends.

Miles didn’t really believe in Holly’s witch stories but he did believe she was allowed to believe whatever she wanted and he didn’t judge her lifestyle. Holly knew this but his acceptance of her is why they became close friends.

—Back at Molly’s Home—-

Miles kept knocking on Molly’s door wondering why she wasn’t answering. They had made plans to hang out today and she even confirmed it this morning. It wasn’t like her to not answer...

Pushing on the door slightly he noticed it was unlocked as Miles slowly entered her house. He had been here dozens of times before but it felt weird coming in without permission.

Looking around the house seemed empty, no one answered when he called out. Yawning Miles felt a bit tired as he wondered if there was any sodas or energy drinks in their fridge. It was common for them to raid each other’s fridges so Miles tonight nothing of it.

Opening the fridge Miles saw the typical food fair Holly’s mom kept stored. However there was one thing out of place...

There was a soda...A Cherry Soda...It had a note tied to it. The note was fancy with cute letters like it was written to a crush.

“To Toby, thanks for all the memories I’ll never forget. I hope maybe to give an experience that you shall always remember as well.”

“What the hell?” Miles thought looking at the soda.

Toby was a bully from their high school. He tortured Holly, called her a freak, told her she looked like she escaped from a Haunted House. One day at lunch he shook up a soda and made it explode all over her.

They hated Toby together. He nothing but a jock asshole who found pleasure in tormenting those he felt different. So why would she be giving him a soda?

They had a graduation ceremony later this week and maybe it was supposed to be an ironic gift? Or maybe...

The thought hit his mind as Miles felt a singe of jealousy wash through him.

“Maybe she had a crush on Toby? Was all that bullying a secret message that he liked her? Did she secretly like him as well?” Miles thought to himself.

Part of him wanted to drink the soda out of spite now and leave...The other part of him just wanted a clear answer.

He let out a loud burp after he finished the pop as he sat down and waited for Holly to get home. If she did have a crush on Toby after all he did to them he wanted to hear it from her...

Holly finally came home around 15 minutes later. She was talking on her cell phone as he looked around and saw Miles sitting in her living room.

“Hey you are early I said 12:30, I had to get my stupid dress for the graduation party.” Holly said seeing Miles looked upset.

“Hey you okay? You seem pissed.” Holly said a bit worried.

“Oh I’m fine...I just helped myself to a cool refreshing beverage. Hope you don’t mind.” Miles said pointing at the can of empty soda.

Holly looked to the soda as her eyes suddenly went wide. A look of terror and fear began to wash through her.

“No...no...no...no no no no! I put that away didn’t I? Oh my god...I forgot to take that out...please tell me you did drink it!” Holly said in a panic.

“So you admit it! You know Toby loves cherry soda you were gonna give him one as a way to ask him out! How could you? He was such an asshole to us both for years!” Miles said angry.

Holly suddenly slapped Miles across the face. In all the years they had known each other she had never raised a hand to him before...

“You idiot! That soda wasn’t a gift for Toby, it was a curse for him! It was a spell I’ve been working on all year! My final way to say screw you for all the terror he put us threw!” Holly said yelling.

“A spell? Did you spike that with laxatives or something?” Miles said getting a bit worried.

“No! I spiked it with magic...I know you never believed in me but I never lied to you. I really am a witch! It took months to brew that potion and disguise it as a soda! It was going to turn him into a woman! Not just anyone either. A total bombshell sexy knockout red head. Huge tits, hourglass figure, large bubble butt, the works! Fiery red hair and lips and nails, really go all out on the whole cherry theme.” Holly said sounded really upset.

Miles had tolerated Holly’s witch claims for years. He sat in on her reading about hexes and curses. He even helped prepare a few spells for her. Of course nothing ever happened but he kind thought it was cool to see someone really into mystical things.

“I’m sorry...I didn’t know. Can’t we just make another?” Miles said. He didn’t think anything was going to happen but maybe they could pull a prank or something.

“You idiot! You don’t understand! This curse was real! It was going to change his world to where everyone expect us and him would always think he was a busty slut! His life would be ruined! We were going to have to ultimate payback! Now I have to try and find the counter curse before....” Holly said freezing as she looked to miles.

“What?” Miles asked brushing the hair out of his eyes.

Wait...His hair was always really short...wasn’t it?

Rushing to a mirror Miles almost passed out at his reflection....

His hair was now bright red. Like a deep crimson. It was also growing rapidly right in front of his eyes. He could feel it tickling his neck as it was growing longer and longer down his shoulders.
